00105 static GHash *global_ops_hash = NULL;

00107 /* ************ operator API, exported ********** */

00109 
00110 wmOperatorType *WM_operatortype_find(const char *idname, int quiet)
00111 {
00112     if (idname[0]) {
00113         wmOperatorType *ot;
00114 
00115         /* needed to support python style names without the _OT_ syntax */
00116         char idname_bl[OP_MAX_TYPENAME];
00117         WM_operator_bl_idname(idname_bl, idname);
00118 
00119         ot = BLI_ghash_lookup(global_ops_hash, idname_bl);
00120         if (ot) {
00121             return ot;
00122         }
00123 
00124         if (!quiet) {
00125             printf("search for unknown operator '%s', '%s'\n", idname_bl, idname);
00126         }
00127     }
00128     else {
00129         if (!quiet) {
00130             printf("search for empty operator\n");
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     return NULL;
00135 }
00136 
00137 /* caller must free */
00138 GHashIterator *WM_operatortype_iter(void)
00139 {
00140     return BLI_ghashIterator_new(global_ops_hash);
00141 }
00142 
00143 /* all ops in 1 list (for time being... needs evaluation later) */
00144 void WM_operatortype_append(void (*opfunc)(wmOperatorType *))
00145 {
00146     wmOperatorType *ot;
00147     
00148     ot = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOperatorType), "operatortype");
00149     ot->srna = RNA_def_struct(&BLENDER_RNA, "", "OperatorProperties");
00150     /* Set the default i18n context now, so that opfunc can redefine it if needed! */
00151     RNA_def_struct_translation_context(ot->srna, BLF_I18NCONTEXT_OPERATOR_DEFAULT);
00152     opfunc(ot);
00153 
00154     if (ot->name == NULL) {
00155         fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Operator %s has no name property!\n", ot->idname);
00156         ot->name = N_("Dummy Name");
00157     }
00158 
00159     // XXX All ops should have a description but for now allow them not to.
00160     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(ot->srna, ot->name, ot->description ? ot->description : N_("(undocumented operator)"));
00161     RNA_def_struct_identifier(ot->srna, ot->idname);
00162 
00163     BLI_ghash_insert(global_ops_hash, (void *)ot->idname, ot);
00164 }
00165 
00166 void WM_operatortype_append_ptr(void (*opfunc)(wmOperatorType *, void *), void *userdata)
00167 {
00168     wmOperatorType *ot;
00169 
00170     ot = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOperatorType), "operatortype");
00171     ot->srna = RNA_def_struct(&BLENDER_RNA, "", "OperatorProperties");
00172     /* Set the default i18n context now, so that opfunc can redefine it if needed! */
00173     RNA_def_struct_translation_context(ot->srna, BLF_I18NCONTEXT_OPERATOR_DEFAULT);
00174     opfunc(ot, userdata);
00175     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(ot->srna, ot->name, ot->description ? ot->description : N_("(undocumented operator)"));
00176     RNA_def_struct_identifier(ot->srna, ot->idname);
00177 
00178     BLI_ghash_insert(global_ops_hash, (void *)ot->idname, ot);
00179 }

00181 /* ********************* macro operator ******************** */
00182 
00183 typedef struct {
00184     int retval;
00185 } MacroData;
00186 
00187 static void wm_macro_start(wmOperator *op)
00188 {
00189     if (op->customdata == NULL) {
00190         op->customdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MacroData), "MacroData");
00191     }
00192 }
00193 
00194 static int wm_macro_end(wmOperator *op, int retval)
00195 {
00196     if (retval & OPERATOR_CANCELLED) {
00197         MacroData *md = op->customdata;
00198 
00199         if (md->retval & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
00200             retval |= OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00201             retval &= ~OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00202         }
00203     }
00204 
00205     /* if modal is ending, free custom data */
00206     if (retval & (OPERATOR_FINISHED | OPERATOR_CANCELLED)) {
00207         if (op->customdata) {
00208             MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00209             op->customdata = NULL;
00210         }
00211     }
00212 
00213     return retval;
00214 }
00215 
00216 /* macro exec only runs exec calls */
00217 static int wm_macro_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00218 {
00219     wmOperator *opm;
00220     int retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00221     
00222     wm_macro_start(op);
00223 
00224     for (opm = op->macro.first; opm; opm = opm->next) {
00225         
00226         if (opm->type->exec) {
00227             retval = opm->type->exec(C, opm);
00228             OPERATOR_RETVAL_CHECK(retval);
00229         
00230             if (retval & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
00231                 MacroData *md = op->customdata;
00232                 md->retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED; /* keep in mind that at least one operator finished */
00233             }
00234             else {
00235                 break; /* operator didn't finish, end macro */
00236             }
00237         }
00238     }
00239     
00240     return wm_macro_end(op, retval);
00241 }
00242 
00243 static int wm_macro_invoke_internal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event, wmOperator *opm)
00244 {
00245     int retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00246 
00247     /* start from operator received as argument */
00248     for (; opm; opm = opm->next) {
00249         if (opm->type->invoke)
00250             retval = opm->type->invoke(C, opm, event);
00251         else if (opm->type->exec)
00252             retval = opm->type->exec(C, opm);
00253 
00254         OPERATOR_RETVAL_CHECK(retval);
00255 
00256         BLI_movelisttolist(&op->reports->list, &opm->reports->list);
00257         
00258         if (retval & OPERATOR_FINISHED) {
00259             MacroData *md = op->customdata;
00260             md->retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED; /* keep in mind that at least one operator finished */
00261         }
00262         else {
00263             break; /* operator didn't finish, end macro */
00264         }
00265     }
00266 
00267     return wm_macro_end(op, retval);
00268 }
00269 
00270 static int wm_macro_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00271 {
00272     wm_macro_start(op);
00273     return wm_macro_invoke_internal(C, op, event, op->macro.first);
00274 }
00275 
00276 static int wm_macro_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00277 {
00278     wmOperator *opm = op->opm;
00279     int retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00280     
00281     if (opm == NULL)
00282         printf("%s: macro error, calling NULL modal()\n", __func__);
00283     else {
00284         retval = opm->type->modal(C, opm, event);
00285         OPERATOR_RETVAL_CHECK(retval);
00286 
00287         /* if this one is done but it's not the last operator in the macro */
00288         if ((retval & OPERATOR_FINISHED) && opm->next) {
00289             MacroData *md = op->customdata;
00290 
00291             md->retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED; /* keep in mind that at least one operator finished */
00292 
00293             retval = wm_macro_invoke_internal(C, op, event, opm->next);
00294 
00295             /* if new operator is modal and also added its own handler */
00296             if (retval & OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL && op->opm != opm) {
00297                 wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00298                 wmEventHandler *handler = NULL;
00299 
00300                 for (handler = win->modalhandlers.first; handler; handler = handler->next) {
00301                     /* first handler in list is the new one */
00302                     if (handler->op == op)
00303                         break;
00304                 }
00305 
00306                 if (handler) {
00307                     BLI_remlink(&win->modalhandlers, handler);
00308                     wm_event_free_handler(handler);
00309                 }
00310 
00311                 /* if operator is blocking, grab cursor
00312                  * This may end up grabbing twice, but we don't care.
00313                  * */
00314                 if (op->opm->type->flag & OPTYPE_BLOCKING) {
00315                     int bounds[4] = {-1, -1, -1, -1};
00316                     int wrap = (U.uiflag & USER_CONTINUOUS_MOUSE) && ((op->opm->flag & OP_GRAB_POINTER) || (op->opm->type->flag & OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER));
00317 
00318                     if (wrap) {
00319                         ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00320                         if (ar) {
00321                             bounds[0] = ar->winrct.xmin;
00322                             bounds[1] = ar->winrct.ymax;
00323                             bounds[2] = ar->winrct.xmax;
00324                             bounds[3] = ar->winrct.ymin;
00325                         }
00326                     }
00327 
00328                     WM_cursor_grab(CTX_wm_window(C), wrap, FALSE, bounds);
00329                 }
00330             }
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     return wm_macro_end(op, retval);
00335 }
00336 
00337 static int wm_macro_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00338 {
00339     /* call cancel on the current modal operator, if any */
00340     if (op->opm && op->opm->type->cancel) {
00341         op->opm->type->cancel(C, op->opm);
00342     }
00343 
00344     return wm_macro_end(op, OPERATOR_CANCELLED);
00345 }
00346 
00347 /* Names have to be static for now */
00348 wmOperatorType *WM_operatortype_append_macro(const char *idname, const char *name, int flag)
00349 {
00350     wmOperatorType *ot;
00351     
00352     if (WM_operatortype_find(idname, TRUE)) {
00353         printf("%s: macro error: operator %s exists\n", __func__, idname);
00354         return NULL;
00355     }
00356     
00357     ot = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOperatorType), "operatortype");
00358     ot->srna = RNA_def_struct(&BLENDER_RNA, "", "OperatorProperties");
00359     
00360     ot->idname = idname;
00361     ot->name = name;
00362     ot->flag = OPTYPE_MACRO | flag;
00363     
00364     ot->exec = wm_macro_exec;
00365     ot->invoke = wm_macro_invoke;
00366     ot->modal = wm_macro_modal;
00367     ot->cancel = wm_macro_cancel;
00368     ot->poll = NULL;
00369 
00370     if (!ot->description) /* XXX All ops should have a description but for now allow them not to. */
00371         ot->description = N_("(undocumented operator)");
00372     
00373     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(ot->srna, ot->name, ot->description);
00374     RNA_def_struct_identifier(ot->srna, ot->idname);
00375     RNA_def_struct_translation_context(ot->srna, BLF_I18NCONTEXT_OPERATOR_DEFAULT);
00376 
00377     BLI_ghash_insert(global_ops_hash, (void *)ot->idname, ot);
00378 
00379     return ot;
00380 }
00381 
00382 void WM_operatortype_append_macro_ptr(void (*opfunc)(wmOperatorType *, void *), void *userdata)
00383 {
00384     wmOperatorType *ot;
00385 
00386     ot = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOperatorType), "operatortype");
00387     ot->srna = RNA_def_struct(&BLENDER_RNA, "", "OperatorProperties");
00388 
00389     ot->flag = OPTYPE_MACRO;
00390     ot->exec = wm_macro_exec;
00391     ot->invoke = wm_macro_invoke;
00392     ot->modal = wm_macro_modal;
00393     ot->cancel = wm_macro_cancel;
00394     ot->poll = NULL;
00395 
00396     if (!ot->description)
00397         ot->description = N_("(undocumented operator)");
00398 
00399     /* Set the default i18n context now, so that opfunc can redefine it if needed! */
00400     RNA_def_struct_translation_context(ot->srna, BLF_I18NCONTEXT_OPERATOR_DEFAULT);
00401     opfunc(ot, userdata);
00402 
00403     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(ot->srna, ot->name, ot->description);
00404     RNA_def_struct_identifier(ot->srna, ot->idname);
00405 
00406     BLI_ghash_insert(global_ops_hash, (void *)ot->idname, ot);
00407 }
00408 
00409 wmOperatorTypeMacro *WM_operatortype_macro_define(wmOperatorType *ot, const char *idname)
00410 {
00411     wmOperatorTypeMacro *otmacro = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOperatorTypeMacro), "wmOperatorTypeMacro");
00412 
00413     BLI_strncpy(otmacro->idname, idname, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00414 
00415     /* do this on first use, since operatordefinitions might have been not done yet */
00416     WM_operator_properties_alloc(&(otmacro->ptr), &(otmacro->properties), idname);
00417     WM_operator_properties_sanitize(otmacro->ptr, 1);
00418 
00419     BLI_addtail(&ot->macro, otmacro);
00420 
00421     {
00422         /* operator should always be found but in the event its not. don't segfault */
00423         wmOperatorType *otsub = WM_operatortype_find(idname, 0);
00424         if (otsub) {
00425             RNA_def_pointer_runtime(ot->srna, otsub->idname, otsub->srna,
00426                                     otsub->name, otsub->description);
00427         }
00428     }
00429 
00430     return otmacro;
00431 }
00432 
00433 static void wm_operatortype_free_macro(wmOperatorType *ot)
00434 {
00435     wmOperatorTypeMacro *otmacro;
00436     
00437     for (otmacro = ot->macro.first; otmacro; otmacro = otmacro->next) {
00438         if (otmacro->ptr) {
00439             WM_operator_properties_free(otmacro->ptr);
00440             MEM_freeN(otmacro->ptr);
00441         }
00442     }
00443     BLI_freelistN(&ot->macro);
00444 }
00445 
00446 
00447 int WM_operatortype_remove(const char *idname)
00448 {
00449     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(idname, 0);
00450 
00451     if (ot == NULL)
00452         return 0;
00453     
00454     RNA_struct_free(&BLENDER_RNA, ot->srna);
00455 
00456     if (ot->last_properties) {
00457         IDP_FreeProperty(ot->last_properties);
00458         MEM_freeN(ot->last_properties);
00459     }
00460 
00461     if (ot->macro.first)
00462         wm_operatortype_free_macro(ot);
00463 
00464     BLI_ghash_remove(global_ops_hash, (void *)ot->idname, NULL, NULL);
00465 
00466     MEM_freeN(ot);
00467     return 1;
00468 }
00469 
00470 /* SOME_OT_op -> some.op */
00471 void WM_operator_py_idname(char *to, const char *from)
00472 {
00473     char *sep = strstr(from, "_OT_");
00474     if (sep) {
00475         int ofs = (sep - from);
00476         
00477         /* note, we use ascii tolower instead of system tolower, because the
00478          * latter depends on the locale, and can lead to idname mistmatch */
00479         memcpy(to, from, sizeof(char) * ofs);
00480         BLI_ascii_strtolower(to, ofs);
00481 
00482         to[ofs] = '.';
00483         BLI_strncpy(to + (ofs + 1), sep + 4, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00484     }
00485     else {
00486         /* should not happen but support just in case */
00487         BLI_strncpy(to, from, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00488     }
00489 }
00490 
00491 /* some.op -> SOME_OT_op */
00492 void WM_operator_bl_idname(char *to, const char *from)
00493 {
00494     if (from) {
00495         char *sep = strchr(from, '.');
00496 
00497         if (sep) {
00498             int ofs = (sep - from);
00499 
00500             memcpy(to, from, sizeof(char) * ofs);
00501             BLI_ascii_strtoupper(to, ofs);
00502 
00503             BLI_strncpy(to + ofs, "_OT_", OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00504             BLI_strncpy(to + (ofs + 4), sep + 1, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00505         }
00506         else {
00507             /* should not happen but support just in case */
00508             BLI_strncpy(to, from, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00509         }
00510     }
00511     else
00512         to[0] = 0;
00513 }
00514 
00515 /* print a string representation of the operator, with the args that it runs 
00516  * so python can run it again,
00517  *
00518  * When calling from an existing wmOperator do.
00519  * WM_operator_pystring(op->type, op->ptr);
00520  */
00521 char *WM_operator_pystring(bContext *C, wmOperatorType *ot, PointerRNA *opptr, int all_args)
00522 {
00523     char idname_py[OP_MAX_TYPENAME];
00524 
00525     /* for building the string */
00526     DynStr *dynstr = BLI_dynstr_new();
00527     char *cstring;
00528     char *cstring_args;
00529 
00530     /* only to get the orginal props for comparisons */
00531     PointerRNA opptr_default;
00532 
00533     if (all_args == 0 || opptr == NULL) {
00534         WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&opptr_default, ot);
00535 
00536         if (opptr == NULL)
00537             opptr = &opptr_default;
00538     }
00539 
00540     WM_operator_py_idname(idname_py, ot->idname);
00541     BLI_dynstr_appendf(dynstr, "bpy.ops.%s(", idname_py);
00542 
00543     cstring_args = RNA_pointer_as_string_keywords(C, opptr, &opptr_default, FALSE, all_args);
00544     BLI_dynstr_append(dynstr, cstring_args);
00545     MEM_freeN(cstring_args);
00546 
00547     if (all_args == 0 || opptr == &opptr_default)
00548         WM_operator_properties_free(&opptr_default);
00549 
00550     BLI_dynstr_append(dynstr, ")");
00551 
00552     cstring = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(dynstr);
00553     BLI_dynstr_free(dynstr);
00554     return cstring;
00555 }
00556 
00557 void WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(PointerRNA *ptr, wmOperatorType *ot)
00558 {
00559     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, ot->srna, NULL, ptr);
00560 }
00561 
00562 void WM_operator_properties_create(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *opstring)
00563 {
00564     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opstring, 0);
00565 
00566     if (ot)
00567         WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(ptr, ot);
00568     else
00569         RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_OperatorProperties, NULL, ptr);
00570 }
00571 
00572 /* similar to the function above except its uses ID properties
00573  * used for keymaps and macros */
00574 void WM_operator_properties_alloc(PointerRNA **ptr, IDProperty **properties, const char *opstring)
00575 {
00576     if (*properties == NULL) {
00577         IDPropertyTemplate val = {0};
00578         *properties = IDP_New(IDP_GROUP, &val, "wmOpItemProp");
00579     }
00580 
00581     if (*ptr == NULL) {
00582         *ptr = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PointerRNA), "wmOpItemPtr");
00583         WM_operator_properties_create(*ptr, opstring);
00584     }
00585 
00586     (*ptr)->data = *properties;
00587 
00588 }
00589 
00590 void WM_operator_properties_sanitize(PointerRNA *ptr, const short no_context)
00591 {
00592     RNA_STRUCT_BEGIN(ptr, prop) {
00593         switch (RNA_property_type(prop)) {
00594             case PROP_ENUM:
00595                 if (no_context)
00596                     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_ENUM_NO_CONTEXT);
00597                 else
00598                     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ENUM_NO_CONTEXT);
00599                 break;
00600             case PROP_POINTER:
00601             {
00602                 StructRNA *ptype = RNA_property_pointer_type(ptr, prop);
00603 
00604                 /* recurse into operator properties */
00605                 if (RNA_struct_is_a(ptype, &RNA_OperatorProperties)) {
00606                     PointerRNA opptr = RNA_property_pointer_get(ptr, prop);
00607                     WM_operator_properties_sanitize(&opptr, no_context);
00608                 }
00609                 break;
00610             }
00611             default:
00612                 break;
00613         }
00614     }
00615     RNA_STRUCT_END;
00616 }
00617 
00618 /* remove all props without PROP_SKIP_SAVE */
00619 void WM_operator_properties_reset(wmOperator *op)
00620 {
00621     if (op->ptr->data) {
00622         PropertyRNA *iterprop;
00623         iterprop = RNA_struct_iterator_property(op->type->srna);
00624 
00625         RNA_PROP_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, iterprop) {
00626             PropertyRNA *prop = itemptr.data;
00627 
00628             if ((RNA_property_flag(prop) & PROP_SKIP_SAVE) == 0) {
00629                 const char *identifier = RNA_property_identifier(prop);
00630                 RNA_struct_idprops_unset(op->ptr, identifier);
00631             }
00632         }
00633         RNA_PROP_END;
00634     }
00635 }
00636 
00637 void WM_operator_properties_free(PointerRNA *ptr)
00638 {
00639     IDProperty *properties = ptr->data;
00640 
00641     if (properties) {
00642         IDP_FreeProperty(properties);
00643         MEM_freeN(properties);
00644         ptr->data = NULL; /* just in case */
00645     }
00646 }
00647 
00648 /* ************ default op callbacks, exported *********** */
00649 
00650 /* invoke callback, uses enum property named "type" */
00651 int WM_menu_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00652 {
00653     PropertyRNA *prop = op->type->prop;
00654     uiPopupMenu *pup;
00655     uiLayout *layout;
00656 
00657     if (prop == NULL) {
00658         printf("%s: %s has no enum property set\n", __func__, op->type->idname);
00659     }
00660     else if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_ENUM) {
00661         printf("%s: %s \"%s\" is not an enum property\n",
00662                __func__, op->type->idname, RNA_property_identifier(prop));
00663     }
00664     else if (RNA_property_is_set(op->ptr, prop)) {
00665         const int retval = op->type->exec(C, op);
00666         OPERATOR_RETVAL_CHECK(retval);
00667         return retval;
00668     }
00669     else {
00670         pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, RNA_struct_ui_name(op->type->srna), ICON_NONE);
00671         layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00672         uiItemsFullEnumO(layout, op->type->idname, RNA_property_identifier(prop), op->ptr->data, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN, 0);
00673         uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00674     }
00675 
00676     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00677 }
00678 
00679 
00680 /* generic enum search invoke popup */
00681 static void operator_enum_search_cb(const struct bContext *C, void *arg_ot, const char *str, uiSearchItems *items)
00682 {
00683     wmOperatorType *ot = (wmOperatorType *)arg_ot;
00684     PropertyRNA *prop = ot->prop;
00685 
00686     if (prop == NULL) {
00687         printf("%s: %s has no enum property set\n",
00688                __func__, ot->idname);
00689     }
00690     else if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_ENUM) {
00691         printf("%s: %s \"%s\" is not an enum property\n",
00692                __func__, ot->idname, RNA_property_identifier(prop));
00693     }
00694     else {
00695         PointerRNA ptr;
00696 
00697         EnumPropertyItem *item, *item_array;
00698         int do_free;
00699 
00700         RNA_pointer_create(NULL, ot->srna, NULL, &ptr);
00701         RNA_property_enum_items((bContext *)C, &ptr, prop, &item_array, NULL, &do_free);
00702 
00703         for (item = item_array; item->identifier; item++) {
00704             /* note: need to give the index rather than the identifier because the enum can be freed */
00705             if (BLI_strcasestr(item->name, str))
00706                 if (0 == uiSearchItemAdd(items, item->name, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(item->value), 0))
00707                     break;
00708         }
00709 
00710         if (do_free)
00711             MEM_freeN(item_array);
00712     }
00713 }
00714 
00715 static void operator_enum_call_cb(struct bContext *C, void *arg1, void *arg2)
00716 {
00717     wmOperatorType *ot = arg1;
00718 
00719     if (ot) {
00720         if (ot->prop) {
00721             PointerRNA props_ptr;
00722             WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&props_ptr, ot);
00723             RNA_property_enum_set(&props_ptr, ot->prop, GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(arg2));
00724             WM_operator_name_call(C, ot->idname, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, &props_ptr);
00725             WM_operator_properties_free(&props_ptr);
00726         }
00727         else {
00728             printf("%s: op->prop for '%s' is NULL\n", __func__, ot->idname);
00729         }
00730     }
00731 }
00732 
00733 static uiBlock *wm_enum_search_menu(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *arg_op)
00734 {
00735     static char search[256] = "";
00736     wmEvent event;
00737     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00738     uiBlock *block;
00739     uiBut *but;
00740     wmOperator *op = (wmOperator *)arg_op;
00741 
00742     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, "_popup", UI_EMBOSS);
00743     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_LOOP | UI_BLOCK_RET_1 | UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
00744 
00745 #if 0 /* ok, this isn't so easy... */
00746     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, RNA_struct_ui_name(op->type->srna), 10, 10, 180, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00747 #endif
00748     but = uiDefSearchBut(block, search, 0, ICON_VIEWZOOM, sizeof(search), 10, 10, 9 * UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, 0, 0, "");
00749     uiButSetSearchFunc(but, operator_enum_search_cb, op->type, operator_enum_call_cb, NULL);
00750 
00751     /* fake button, it holds space for search items */
00752     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "", 10, 10 - uiSearchBoxhHeight(), 9 * UI_UNIT_X, uiSearchBoxhHeight(), NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL);
00753 
00754     uiPopupBoundsBlock(block, 6, 0, -UI_UNIT_Y); /* move it downwards, mouse over button */
00755     uiEndBlock(C, block);
00756 
00757     event = *(win->eventstate);  /* XXX huh huh? make api call */
00758     event.type = EVT_BUT_OPEN;
00759     event.val = KM_PRESS;
00760     event.customdata = but;
00761     event.customdatafree = FALSE;
00762     wm_event_add(win, &event);
00763 
00764     return block;
00765 }
00766 
00767 
00768 int WM_enum_search_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00769 {
00770     uiPupBlock(C, wm_enum_search_menu, op);
00771     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00772 }
00773 
00774 /* Can't be used as an invoke directly, needs message arg (can be NULL) */
00775 int WM_operator_confirm_message(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, const char *message)
00776 {
00777     uiPopupMenu *pup;
00778     uiLayout *layout;
00779     IDProperty *properties = op->ptr->data;
00780 
00781     if (properties && properties->len)
00782         properties = IDP_CopyProperty(op->ptr->data);
00783     else
00784         properties = NULL;
00785 
00786     pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, IFACE_("OK?"), ICON_QUESTION);
00787     layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00788     uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, op->type, message, ICON_NONE, properties, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN, 0);
00789     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00790     
00791     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00792 }
00793 
00794 
00795 int WM_operator_confirm(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00796 {
00797     return WM_operator_confirm_message(C, op, NULL);
00798 }
00799 
00800 /* op->invoke, opens fileselect if path property not set, otherwise executes */
00801 int WM_operator_filesel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00802 {
00803     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
00804         return WM_operator_call_notest(C, op); /* call exec direct */
00805     } 
00806     else {
00807         WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00808         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00809     }
00810 }
00811 
00812 int WM_operator_filesel_ensure_ext_imtype(wmOperator *op, const char imtype)
00813 {
00814     PropertyRNA *prop;
00815     char filepath[FILE_MAX];
00816     /* dont NULL check prop, this can only run on ops with a 'filepath' */
00817     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filepath");
00818     RNA_property_string_get(op->ptr, prop, filepath);
00819     if (BKE_add_image_extension(filepath, imtype)) {
00820         RNA_property_string_set(op->ptr, prop, filepath);
00821         /* note, we could check for and update 'filename' here,
00822          * but so far nothing needs this. */
00823         return TRUE;
00824     }
00825     return FALSE;
00826 }

00828 /* default properties for fileselect */
00829 void WM_operator_properties_filesel(wmOperatorType *ot, int filter, short type, short action, short flag, short display)
00830 {
00831     PropertyRNA *prop;
00832 
00833     static EnumPropertyItem file_display_items[] = {
00834         {FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY, "FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY", 0, "Default", "Automatically determine display type for files"},
00835         {FILE_SHORTDISPLAY, "FILE_SHORTDISPLAY", ICON_SHORTDISPLAY, "Short List", "Display files as short list"},
00836         {FILE_LONGDISPLAY, "FILE_LONGDISPLAY", ICON_LONGDISPLAY, "Long List", "Display files as a detailed list"},
00837         {FILE_IMGDISPLAY, "FILE_IMGDISPLAY", ICON_IMGDISPLAY, "Thumbnails", "Display files as thumbnails"},
00838         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00839     };
00840 
00841 
00842     if (flag & WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH)
00843         RNA_def_string_file_path(ot->srna, "filepath", "", FILE_MAX, "File Path", "Path to file");
00844 
00845     if (flag & WM_FILESEL_DIRECTORY)
00846         RNA_def_string_dir_path(ot->srna, "directory", "", FILE_MAX, "Directory", "Directory of the file");
00847 
00848     if (flag & WM_FILESEL_FILENAME)
00849         RNA_def_string_file_name(ot->srna, "filename", "", FILE_MAX, "File Name", "Name of the file");
00850 
00851     if (flag & WM_FILESEL_FILES)
00852         RNA_def_collection_runtime(ot->srna, "files", &RNA_OperatorFileListElement, "Files", "");
00853 
00854     if (action == FILE_SAVE) {
00855         prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "check_existing", 1, "Check Existing", "Check and warn on overwriting existing files");
00856         RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00857     }
00858     
00859     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_blender", (filter & BLENDERFILE), "Filter .blend files", "");
00860     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00861     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_image", (filter & IMAGEFILE), "Filter image files", "");
00862     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00863     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_movie", (filter & MOVIEFILE), "Filter movie files", "");
00864     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00865     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_python", (filter & PYSCRIPTFILE), "Filter python files", "");
00866     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00867     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_font", (filter & FTFONTFILE), "Filter font files", "");
00868     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00869     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_sound", (filter & SOUNDFILE), "Filter sound files", "");
00870     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00871     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_text", (filter & TEXTFILE), "Filter text files", "");
00872     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00873     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_btx", (filter & BTXFILE), "Filter btx files", "");
00874     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00875     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_collada", (filter & COLLADAFILE), "Filter COLLADA files", "");
00876     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00877     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "filter_folder", (filter & FOLDERFILE), "Filter folders", "");
00878     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00879 
00880     prop = RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "filemode", type, FILE_LOADLIB, FILE_SPECIAL,
00881                        "File Browser Mode", "The setting for the file browser mode to load a .blend file, a library or a special file",
00882                        FILE_LOADLIB, FILE_SPECIAL);
00883     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00884 
00885     if (flag & WM_FILESEL_RELPATH)
00886         RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "relative_path", TRUE, "Relative Path", "Select the file relative to the blend file");
00887 
00888     prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "display_type", file_display_items, display, "Display Type", "");
00889     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN | PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00890 }

00928 
00929 /* op->poll */
00930 int WM_operator_winactive(bContext *C)
00931 {
00932     if (CTX_wm_window(C) == NULL) return 0;
00933     return 1;
00934 }
00935 
00936 /* return FALSE, if the UI should be disabled */
00937 int WM_operator_check_ui_enabled(const bContext *C, const char *idname)
00938 {
00939     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00940     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00941 
00942     return !(ED_undo_valid(C, idname) == 0 || WM_jobs_test(wm, scene));
00943 }
00944 
00945 wmOperator *WM_operator_last_redo(const bContext *C)
00946 {
00947     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00948     wmOperator *op;
00949 
00950     /* only for operators that are registered and did an undo push */
00951     for (op = wm->operators.last; op; op = op->prev)
00952         if ((op->type->flag & OPTYPE_REGISTER) && (op->type->flag & OPTYPE_UNDO))
00953             break;
00954 
00955     return op;
00956 }
00957 
00958 static uiBlock *wm_block_create_redo(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *arg_op)
00959 {
00960     wmOperator *op = arg_op;
00961     uiBlock *block;
00962     uiLayout *layout;
00963     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
00964     int width = 300;
00965     
00966 
00967     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
00968     uiBlockClearFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_LOOP);
00969     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_KEEP_OPEN | UI_BLOCK_RET_1 | UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
00970 
00971     /* if register is not enabled, the operator gets freed on OPERATOR_FINISHED
00972      * ui_apply_but_funcs_after calls ED_undo_operator_repeate_cb and crashes */
00973     assert(op->type->flag & OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00974 
00975     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, ED_undo_operator_repeat_cb_evt, arg_op);
00976     layout = uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, 0, 0, width, UI_UNIT_Y, style);
00977 
00978     if (!WM_operator_check_ui_enabled(C, op->type->name))
00979         uiLayoutSetEnabled(layout, 0);
00980 
00981     if (op->type->flag & OPTYPE_MACRO) {
00982         for (op = op->macro.first; op; op = op->next) {
00983             uiItemL(layout, RNA_struct_ui_name(op->type->srna), ICON_NONE);
00984             uiLayoutOperatorButs(C, layout, op, NULL, 'H', UI_LAYOUT_OP_SHOW_TITLE);
00985         }
00986     }
00987     else {
00988         uiLayoutOperatorButs(C, layout, op, NULL, 'H', UI_LAYOUT_OP_SHOW_TITLE);
00989     }
00990     
00991 
00992     uiPopupBoundsBlock(block, 4, 0, 0);
00993     uiEndBlock(C, block);
00994 
00995     return block;
00996 }
00997 
00998 typedef struct wmOpPopUp {
00999     wmOperator *op;
01000     int width;
01001     int height;
01002     int free_op;
01003 } wmOpPopUp;
01004 
01005 /* Only invoked by OK button in popups created with wm_block_dialog_create() */
01006 static void dialog_exec_cb(bContext *C, void *arg1, void *arg2)
01007 {
01008     wmOpPopUp *data = arg1;
01009     uiBlock *block = arg2;
01010 
01011     WM_operator_call(C, data->op);
01012 
01013     /* let execute handle freeing it */
01014     //data->free_op= FALSE;
01015     //data->op= NULL;
01016 
01017     /* in this case, wm_operator_ui_popup_cancel wont run */
01018     MEM_freeN(data);
01019 
01020     uiPupBlockClose(C, block);
01021 }
01022 
01023 static void dialog_check_cb(bContext *C, void *op_ptr, void *UNUSED(arg))
01024 {
01025     wmOperator *op = op_ptr;
01026     if (op->type->check) {
01027         if (op->type->check(C, op)) {
01028             /* refresh */
01029         }
01030     }
01031 }
01032 
01033 /* Dialogs are popups that require user verification (click OK) before exec */
01034 static uiBlock *wm_block_dialog_create(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *userData)
01035 {
01036     wmOpPopUp *data = userData;
01037     wmOperator *op = data->op;
01038     uiBlock *block;
01039     uiLayout *layout;
01040     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
01041 
01042     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
01043     uiBlockClearFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_LOOP);
01044     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_KEEP_OPEN | UI_BLOCK_RET_1 | UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
01045 
01046     layout = uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, 0, 0, data->width, data->height, style);
01047     
01048     uiBlockSetFunc(block, dialog_check_cb, op, NULL);
01049 
01050     uiLayoutOperatorButs(C, layout, op, NULL, 'H', UI_LAYOUT_OP_SHOW_TITLE);
01051     
01052     /* clear so the OK button is left alone */
01053     uiBlockSetFunc(block, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01054 
01055     /* new column so as not to interfear with custom layouts [#26436] */
01056     {
01057         uiBlock *col_block;
01058         uiLayout *col;
01059         uiBut *btn;
01060 
01061         col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, FALSE);
01062         col_block = uiLayoutGetBlock(col);
01063         /* Create OK button, the callback of which will execute op */
01064         btn = uiDefBut(col_block, BUT, 0, IFACE_("OK"), 0, -30, 0, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
01065         uiButSetFunc(btn, dialog_exec_cb, data, col_block);
01066     }
01067 
01068     /* center around the mouse */
01069     uiPopupBoundsBlock(block, 4, data->width / -2, data->height / 2);
01070     uiEndBlock(C, block);
01071 
01072     return block;
01073 }
01074 
01075 static uiBlock *wm_operator_ui_create(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *userData)
01076 {
01077     wmOpPopUp *data = userData;
01078     wmOperator *op = data->op;
01079     uiBlock *block;
01080     uiLayout *layout;
01081     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
01082 
01083     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
01084     uiBlockClearFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_LOOP);
01085     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_KEEP_OPEN | UI_BLOCK_RET_1 | UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
01086 
01087     layout = uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, 0, 0, data->width, data->height, style);
01088 
01089     /* since ui is defined the auto-layout args are not used */
01090     uiLayoutOperatorButs(C, layout, op, NULL, 'V', 0);
01091 
01092     uiPopupBoundsBlock(block, 4, 0, 0);
01093     uiEndBlock(C, block);
01094 
01095     return block;
01096 }
01097 
01098 static void wm_operator_ui_popup_cancel(void *userData)
01099 {
01100     wmOpPopUp *data = userData;
01101     if (data->free_op && data->op) {
01102         wmOperator *op = data->op;
01103         WM_operator_free(op);
01104     }
01105 
01106     MEM_freeN(data);
01107 }
01108 
01109 static void wm_operator_ui_popup_ok(struct bContext *C, void *arg, int retval)
01110 {
01111     wmOpPopUp *data = arg;
01112     wmOperator *op = data->op;
01113 
01114     if (op && retval > 0)
01115         WM_operator_call(C, op);
01116 }
01117 
01118 int WM_operator_ui_popup(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int width, int height)
01119 {
01120     wmOpPopUp *data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOpPopUp), "WM_operator_ui_popup");
01121     data->op = op;
01122     data->width = width;
01123     data->height = height;
01124     data->free_op = TRUE; /* if this runs and gets registered we may want not to free it */
01125     uiPupBlockEx(C, wm_operator_ui_create, NULL, wm_operator_ui_popup_cancel, data);
01126     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01127 }
01128 
01129 /* operator menu needs undo, for redo callback */
01130 int WM_operator_props_popup(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01131 {
01132     
01133     if ((op->type->flag & OPTYPE_REGISTER) == 0) {
01134         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
01135                     "Operator '%s' does not have register enabled, incorrect invoke function.", op->type->idname);
01136         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01137     }
01138     
01139     ED_undo_push_op(C, op);
01140     wm_operator_register(C, op);
01141 
01142     uiPupBlock(C, wm_block_create_redo, op);
01143 
01144     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01145 }
01146 
01147 int WM_operator_props_dialog_popup(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int width, int height)
01148 {
01149     wmOpPopUp *data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmOpPopUp), "WM_operator_props_dialog_popup");
01150     
01151     data->op = op;
01152     data->width = width;
01153     data->height = height;
01154     data->free_op = TRUE; /* if this runs and gets registered we may want not to free it */
01155 
01156     /* op is not executed until popup OK but is clicked */
01157     uiPupBlockEx(C, wm_block_dialog_create, wm_operator_ui_popup_ok, wm_operator_ui_popup_cancel, data);
01158 
01159     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01160 }
01161 
01162 int WM_operator_redo_popup(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01163 {
01164     /* CTX_wm_reports(C) because operator is on stack, not active in event system */
01165     if ((op->type->flag & OPTYPE_REGISTER) == 0) {
01166         BKE_reportf(CTX_wm_reports(C), RPT_ERROR, "Operator redo '%s' does not have register enabled, incorrect invoke function.", op->type->idname);
01167         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01168     }
01169     if (op->type->poll && op->type->poll(C) == 0) {
01170         BKE_reportf(CTX_wm_reports(C), RPT_ERROR, "Operator redo '%s': wrong context.", op->type->idname);
01171         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01172     }
01173     
01174     uiPupBlock(C, wm_block_create_redo, op);
01175 
01176     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01177 }

01220  * since popup blocks don't get regenerated like panels do */

01224      * a better fix */

01230 
01231 static int wm_resource_check_prev(void)
01232 {
01233 
01234     char *res = BLI_get_folder_version(BLENDER_RESOURCE_PATH_USER, BLENDER_VERSION, TRUE);
01235 
01236     // if (res) printf("USER: %s\n", res);
01237 
01238 #if 0 /* ignore the local folder */
01239     if (res == NULL) {
01240         /* with a local dir, copying old files isn't useful since local dir get priority for config */
01241         res = BLI_get_folder_version(BLENDER_RESOURCE_PATH_LOCAL, BLENDER_VERSION, TRUE);
01242     }
01243 #endif
01244 
01245     // if (res) printf("LOCAL: %s\n", res);
01246     if (res) {
01247         return FALSE;
01248     }
01249     else {
01250         return (BLI_get_folder_version(BLENDER_RESOURCE_PATH_USER, BLENDER_VERSION - 1, TRUE) != NULL);
01251     }
01252 }
01253 
01254 static uiBlock *wm_block_create_splash(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *UNUSED(arg))
01255 {
01256     uiBlock *block;
01257     uiBut *but;
01258     uiLayout *layout, *split, *col;
01259     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
01260     struct RecentFile *recent;
01261     int i;
01262     MenuType *mt = WM_menutype_find("USERPREF_MT_splash", TRUE);
01263     char url[96];
01264 
01265 #ifndef WITH_HEADLESS
01266     extern char datatoc_splash_png[];
01267     extern int datatoc_splash_png_size;
01268 
01269     ImBuf *ibuf = IMB_ibImageFromMemory((unsigned char *)datatoc_splash_png, datatoc_splash_png_size, IB_rect, "<splash screen>");
01270 #else
01271     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
01272 #endif
01273 
01274 
01275 #ifdef WITH_BUILDINFO
01276     int ver_width, rev_width;
01277     char version_buf[128];
01278     char revision_buf[128];
01279     extern char build_rev[];
01280     
01281     BLI_snprintf(version_buf, sizeof(version_buf),
01282                  "%d.%02d.%d", BLENDER_VERSION / 100, BLENDER_VERSION % 100, BLENDER_SUBVERSION);
01283     BLI_snprintf(revision_buf, sizeof(revision_buf), "r%s", build_rev);
01284     
01285     BLF_size(style->widgetlabel.uifont_id, style->widgetlabel.points, U.dpi);
01286     ver_width = (int)BLF_width(style->widgetlabel.uifont_id, version_buf) + 5;
01287     rev_width = (int)BLF_width(style->widgetlabel.uifont_id, revision_buf) + 5;
01288 #endif //WITH_BUILDINFO
01289 
01290     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, "_popup", UI_EMBOSS);
01291     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_KEEP_OPEN);
01292     
01293     but = uiDefBut(block, BUT_IMAGE, 0, "", 0, 10, 501, 282, ibuf, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, ""); /* button owns the imbuf now */
01294     uiButSetFunc(but, wm_block_splash_close, block, NULL);
01295     uiBlockSetFunc(block, wm_block_splash_refreshmenu, block, NULL);
01296     
01297 #ifdef WITH_BUILDINFO   
01298     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, version_buf, 494 - ver_width, 282 - 24, ver_width, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL);
01299     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, revision_buf, 494 - rev_width, 282 - 36, rev_width, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL);
01300 #endif //WITH_BUILDINFO
01301     
01302     layout = uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, 10, 2, 480, 110, style);
01303     
01304     uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
01305     /* show the splash menu (containing interaction presets), using python */
01306     if (mt) {
01307         Menu menu = {NULL};
01308         menu.layout = layout;
01309         menu.type = mt;
01310         mt->draw(C, &menu);
01311 
01312 //      wmWindowManager *wm= CTX_wm_manager(C);
01313 //      uiItemM(layout, C, "USERPREF_MT_keyconfigs", U.keyconfigstr, ICON_NONE);
01314     }
01315     
01316     uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSP);
01317     uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(layout, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN);
01318     
01319     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
01320     col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01321     uiItemL(col, "Links", ICON_NONE);
01322     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("Donations"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", "http://www.blender.org/blenderorg/blender-foundation/donation-payment");
01323     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("Credits"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", "http://www.blender.org/development/credits");
01324     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("Release Log"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", "http://www.blender.org/development/release-logs/blender-263");
01325     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("Manual"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", "http://wiki.blender.org/index.php/Doc:2.6/Manual");
01326     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("Blender Website"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", "http://www.blender.org");
01327     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("User Community"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", "http://www.blender.org/community/user-community");
01328     if (strcmp(STRINGIFY(BLENDER_VERSION_CYCLE), "release") == 0) {
01329         BLI_snprintf(url, sizeof(url), "http://www.blender.org/documentation/blender_python_api_%d_%d" STRINGIFY(BLENDER_VERSION_CHAR) "_release", BLENDER_VERSION / 100, BLENDER_VERSION % 100);
01330     }
01331     else {
01332         BLI_snprintf(url, sizeof(url), "http://www.blender.org/documentation/blender_python_api_%d_%d_%d", BLENDER_VERSION / 100, BLENDER_VERSION % 100, BLENDER_SUBVERSION);
01333     }
01334     uiItemStringO(col, IFACE_("Python API Reference"), ICON_URL, "WM_OT_url_open", "url", url);
01335     uiItemL(col, "", ICON_NONE);
01336 
01337     col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01338 
01339     if (wm_resource_check_prev()) {
01340         uiItemO(col, NULL, ICON_NEW, "WM_OT_copy_prev_settings");
01341         uiItemS(col);
01342     }
01343 
01344     uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Recent"), ICON_NONE);
01345     for (recent = G.recent_files.first, i = 0; (i < 5) && (recent); recent = recent->next, i++) {
01346         uiItemStringO(col, BLI_path_basename(recent->filepath), ICON_FILE_BLEND, "WM_OT_open_mainfile", "filepath", recent->filepath);
01347     }
01348 
01349     uiItemS(col);
01350     uiItemO(col, NULL, ICON_RECOVER_LAST, "WM_OT_recover_last_session");
01351     uiItemL(col, "", ICON_NONE);
01352     
01353     uiCenteredBoundsBlock(block, 0);
01354     uiEndBlock(C, block);
01355     
01356     return block;
01357 }

01376 
01377 /* ***************** Search menu ************************* */
01378 static void operator_call_cb(struct bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg1), void *arg2)
01379 {
01380     wmOperatorType *ot = arg2;
01381     
01382     if (ot)
01383         WM_operator_name_call(C, ot->idname, WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01384 }
01385 
01386 static void operator_search_cb(const struct bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), const char *str, uiSearchItems *items)
01387 {
01388     GHashIterator *iter = WM_operatortype_iter();
01389 
01390     for (; !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(iter); BLI_ghashIterator_step(iter)) {
01391         wmOperatorType *ot = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(iter);
01392 
01393         if ((ot->flag & OPTYPE_INTERNAL) && (G.debug & G_DEBUG_WM) == 0)
01394             continue;
01395 
01396         if (BLI_strcasestr(ot->name, str)) {
01397             if (WM_operator_poll((bContext *)C, ot)) {
01398                 char name[256];
01399                 int len = strlen(ot->name);
01400                 
01401                 /* display name for menu, can hold hotkey */
01402                 BLI_strncpy(name, ot->name, sizeof(name));
01403                 
01404                 /* check for hotkey */
01405                 if (len < sizeof(name) - 6) {
01406                     if (WM_key_event_operator_string(C, ot->idname, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, NULL, TRUE,
01407                                                      &name[len + 1], sizeof(name) - len - 1))
01408                     {
01409                         name[len] = '|';
01410                     }
01411                 }
01412                 
01413                 if (0 == uiSearchItemAdd(items, name, ot, 0))
01414                     break;
01415             }
01416         }
01417     }
01418     BLI_ghashIterator_free(iter);
01419 }
01420 
01421 static uiBlock *wm_block_search_menu(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *UNUSED(arg_op))
01422 {
01423     static char search[256] = "";
01424     wmEvent event;
01425     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
01426     uiBlock *block;
01427     uiBut *but;
01428     
01429     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, "_popup", UI_EMBOSS);
01430     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_LOOP | UI_BLOCK_RET_1 | UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
01431     
01432     but = uiDefSearchBut(block, search, 0, ICON_VIEWZOOM, sizeof(search), 10, 10, 9 * UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, 0, 0, "");
01433     uiButSetSearchFunc(but, operator_search_cb, NULL, operator_call_cb, NULL);
01434     
01435     /* fake button, it holds space for search items */
01436     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "", 10, 10 - uiSearchBoxhHeight(), 9 * UI_UNIT_X, uiSearchBoxhHeight(), NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL);
01437     
01438     uiPopupBoundsBlock(block, 6, 0, -UI_UNIT_Y); /* move it downwards, mouse over button */
01439     uiEndBlock(C, block);
01440     
01441     event = *(win->eventstate);  /* XXX huh huh? make api call */
01442     event.type = EVT_BUT_OPEN;
01443     event.val = KM_PRESS;
01444     event.customdata = but;
01445     event.customdatafree = FALSE;
01446     wm_event_add(win, &event);
01447     
01448     return block;
01449 }
01450 
01451 static int wm_search_menu_exec(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01452 {
01453     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;   
01454 }
01455 
01456 static int wm_search_menu_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01457 {
01458     uiPupBlock(C, wm_block_search_menu, op);
01459     
01460     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01461 }
01462 
01463 /* op->poll */
01464 static int wm_search_menu_poll(bContext *C)
01465 {
01466     if (CTX_wm_window(C) == NULL) {
01467         return 0;
01468     }
01469     else {
01470         ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01471         if (sa) {
01472             if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_CONSOLE) return 0;  // XXX - so we can use the shortcut in the console
01473             if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_TEXT) return 0;  // XXX - so we can use the spacebar in the text editor
01474         }
01475         else {
01476             Object *editob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01477             if (editob && editob->type == OB_FONT) return 0;  // XXX - so we can use the spacebar for entering text
01478         }
01479     }
01480     return 1;
01481 }

01487     
01488     ot->invoke = wm_search_menu_invoke;
01489     ot->exec = wm_search_menu_exec;
01490     ot->poll = wm_search_menu_poll;
01491 }

01516 /* ************ window / screen operator definitions ************** */
01517 
01518 /* this poll functions is needed in place of WM_operator_winactive
01519  * while it crashes on full screen */
01520 static int wm_operator_winactive_normal(bContext *C)
01521 {
01522     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
01523 
01524     if (win == NULL || win->screen == NULL || win->screen->full != SCREENNORMAL)
01525         return 0;
01526 
01527     return 1;
01528 }

01572 
01573 /* *************** open file **************** */
01574 
01575 static void open_set_load_ui(wmOperator *op)
01576 {
01577     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "load_ui"))
01578         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "load_ui", !(U.flag & USER_FILENOUI));
01579 }
01580 
01581 static void open_set_use_scripts(wmOperator *op)
01582 {
01583     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "use_scripts")) {
01584         /* use G_SCRIPT_AUTOEXEC rather than the userpref because this means if
01585          * the flag has been disabled from the command line, then opening
01586          * from the menu wont enable this setting. */
01587         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "use_scripts", (G.f & G_SCRIPT_AUTOEXEC));
01588     }
01589 }
01590 
01591 static int wm_open_mainfile_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01592 {
01593     const char *openname = G.main->name;
01594 
01595     if (CTX_wm_window(C) == NULL) {
01596         /* in rare cases this could happen, when trying to invoke in background
01597          * mode on load for example. Don't use poll for this because exec()
01598          * can still run without a window */
01599         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Context window not set");
01600         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01601     }
01602 
01603     /* if possible, get the name of the most recently used .blend file */
01604     if (G.recent_files.first) {
01605         struct RecentFile *recent = G.recent_files.first;
01606         openname = recent->filepath;
01607     }
01608 
01609     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", openname);
01610     open_set_load_ui(op);
01611     open_set_use_scripts(op);
01612 
01613     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
01614 
01615     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01616 }
01617 
01618 static int wm_open_mainfile_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01619 {
01620     char path[FILE_MAX];
01621 
01622     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01623     open_set_load_ui(op);
01624     open_set_use_scripts(op);
01625 
01626     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "load_ui"))
01627         G.fileflags &= ~G_FILE_NO_UI;
01628     else
01629         G.fileflags |= G_FILE_NO_UI;
01630         
01631     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_scripts"))
01632         G.f |= G_SCRIPT_AUTOEXEC;
01633     else
01634         G.f &= ~G_SCRIPT_AUTOEXEC;
01635     
01636     // XXX wm in context is not set correctly after WM_read_file -> crash
01637     // do it before for now, but is this correct with multiple windows?
01638     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01639 
01640     WM_read_file(C, path, op->reports);
01641     
01642     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01643 }
01644 
01645 static void WM_OT_open_mainfile(wmOperatorType *ot)
01646 {
01647     ot->name = "Open Blender File";
01648     ot->idname = "WM_OT_open_mainfile";
01649     ot->description = "Open a Blender file";
01650 
01651     ot->invoke = wm_open_mainfile_invoke;
01652     ot->exec = wm_open_mainfile_exec;
01653     /* ommit window poll so this can work in background mode */
01654 
01655     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE | BLENDERFILE, FILE_BLENDER, FILE_OPENFILE,
01656                                    WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
01657 
01658     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "load_ui", 1, "Load UI", "Load user interface setup in the .blend file");
01659     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_scripts", 1, "Trusted Source",
01660                     "Allow .blend file to execute scripts automatically, default available from system preferences");
01661 }
01662 
01663 /* **************** link/append *************** */
01664 
01665 int wm_link_append_poll(bContext *C)
01666 {
01667     if (WM_operator_winactive(C)) {
01668         /* linking changes active object which is pretty useful in general,
01669          * but which totally confuses edit mode (i.e. it becoming not so obvious
01670          * to leave from edit mode and inwalid tools in toolbar might be displayed)
01671          * so disable link/append when in edit mode (sergey) */
01672         if (CTX_data_edit_object(C))
01673             return 0;
01674 
01675         return 1;
01676     }
01677 
01678     return 0;
01679 }
01680 
01681 static int wm_link_append_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01682 {
01683     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
01684         return WM_operator_call_notest(C, op);
01685     } 
01686     else {
01687         /* XXX TODO solve where to get last linked library from */
01688         if (G.lib[0] != '\0') {
01689             RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", G.lib);
01690         }
01691         else if (G.relbase_valid) {
01692             char path[FILE_MAX];
01693             BLI_strncpy(path, G.main->name, sizeof(G.main->name));
01694             BLI_parent_dir(path);
01695             RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01696         }
01697         WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
01698         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01699     }
01700 }
01701 
01702 static short wm_link_append_flag(wmOperator *op)
01703 {
01704     short flag = 0;
01705 
01706     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "autoselect")) flag |= FILE_AUTOSELECT;
01707     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "active_layer")) flag |= FILE_ACTIVELAY;
01708     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "relative_path")) flag |= FILE_RELPATH;
01709     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "link")) flag |= FILE_LINK;
01710     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "instance_groups")) flag |= FILE_GROUP_INSTANCE;
01711 
01712     return flag;
01713 }
01714 
01715 static int wm_link_append_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01716 {
01717     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
01718     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01719     Main *mainl = NULL;
01720     BlendHandle *bh;
01721     PropertyRNA *prop;
01722     char name[FILE_MAX], dir[FILE_MAX], libname[FILE_MAX], group[GROUP_MAX];
01723     int idcode, totfiles = 0;
01724     short flag;
01725 
01726     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filename", name);
01727     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "directory", dir);
01728 
01729     /* test if we have a valid data */
01730     if (BLO_is_a_library(dir, libname, group) == 0) {
01731         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Not a library");
01732         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01733     }
01734     else if (group[0] == 0) {
01735         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Nothing indicated");
01736         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01737     }
01738     else if (BLI_path_cmp(bmain->name, libname) == 0) {
01739         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot use current file as library");
01740         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01741     }
01742 
01743     /* check if something is indicated for append/link */
01744     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "files");
01745     if (prop) {
01746         totfiles = RNA_property_collection_length(op->ptr, prop);
01747         if (totfiles == 0) {
01748             if (name[0] == '\0') {
01749                 BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Nothing indicated");
01750                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01751             }
01752         }
01753     }
01754     else if (name[0] == '\0') {
01755         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Nothing indicated");
01756         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01757     }
01758 
01759     bh = BLO_blendhandle_from_file(libname, op->reports);
01760 
01761     if (bh == NULL) {
01762         /* unlikely since we just browsed it, but possible
01763          * error reports will have been made by BLO_blendhandle_from_file() */
01764         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01765     }
01766 
01767 
01768     /* from here down, no error returns */
01769 
01770     idcode = BKE_idcode_from_name(group);
01771 
01772     /* now we have or selected, or an indicated file */
01773     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "autoselect"))
01774         scene_deselect_all(scene);
01775 
01776     
01777     flag = wm_link_append_flag(op);
01778 
01779     /* sanity checks for flag */
01780     if (scene->id.lib && (flag & FILE_GROUP_INSTANCE)) {
01781         /* TODO, user never gets this message */
01782         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "Scene '%s' is linked, group instance disabled", scene->id.name + 2);
01783         flag &= ~FILE_GROUP_INSTANCE;
01784     }
01785 
01786 
01787     /* tag everything, all untagged data can be made local
01788      * its also generally useful to know what is new
01789      *
01790      * take extra care flag_all_listbases_ids(LIB_LINK_TAG, 0) is called after! */
01791     flag_all_listbases_ids(LIB_PRE_EXISTING, 1);
01792 
01793     /* here appending/linking starts */
01794     mainl = BLO_library_append_begin(bmain, &bh, libname);
01795     if (totfiles == 0) {
01796         BLO_library_append_named_part_ex(C, mainl, &bh, name, idcode, flag);
01797     }
01798     else {
01799         RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "files") {
01800             RNA_string_get(&itemptr, "name", name);
01801             BLO_library_append_named_part_ex(C, mainl, &bh, name, idcode, flag);
01802         }
01803         RNA_END;
01804     }
01805     BLO_library_append_end(C, mainl, &bh, idcode, flag);
01806     
01807     /* mark all library linked objects to be updated */
01808     recalc_all_library_objects(bmain);
01809 
01810     /* append, rather than linking */
01811     if ((flag & FILE_LINK) == 0) {
01812         Library *lib = BLI_findstring(&bmain->library, libname, offsetof(Library, filepath));
01813         if (lib) BKE_library_make_local(bmain, lib, 1);
01814         else BLI_assert(!"cant find name of just added library!");
01815     }
01816 
01817     /* important we unset, otherwise these object wont
01818      * link into other scenes from this blend file */
01819     flag_all_listbases_ids(LIB_PRE_EXISTING, 0);
01820 
01821     /* recreate dependency graph to include new objects */
01822     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01823     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01824 
01825     BLO_blendhandle_close(bh);
01826 
01827     /* XXX TODO: align G.lib with other directory storage (like last opened image etc...) */
01828     BLI_strncpy(G.lib, dir, FILE_MAX);
01829 
01830     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01831 
01832     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01833 }
01834 
01835 static void WM_OT_link_append(wmOperatorType *ot)
01836 {
01837     ot->name = "Link/Append from Library";
01838     ot->idname = "WM_OT_link_append";
01839     ot->description = "Link or Append from a Library .blend file";
01840     
01841     ot->invoke = wm_link_append_invoke;
01842     ot->exec = wm_link_append_exec;
01843     ot->poll = wm_link_append_poll;
01844     
01845     ot->flag |= OPTYPE_UNDO;
01846 
01847     WM_operator_properties_filesel(
01848         ot, FOLDERFILE | BLENDERFILE, FILE_LOADLIB, FILE_OPENFILE,
01849         WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH | WM_FILESEL_DIRECTORY | WM_FILESEL_FILENAME | WM_FILESEL_RELPATH | WM_FILESEL_FILES,
01850         FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
01851     
01852     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "link", 1, "Link", "Link the objects or datablocks rather than appending");
01853     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "autoselect", 1, "Select", "Select the linked objects");
01854     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "active_layer", 1, "Active Layer", "Put the linked objects on the active layer");
01855     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "instance_groups", 1, "Instance Groups", "Create instances for each group as a DupliGroup");
01856 }   
01857 
01858 /* *************** recover last session **************** */
01859 
01860 static int wm_recover_last_session_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01861 {
01862     char filename[FILE_MAX];
01863 
01864     G.fileflags |= G_FILE_RECOVER;
01865 
01866     // XXX wm in context is not set correctly after WM_read_file -> crash
01867     // do it before for now, but is this correct with multiple windows?
01868     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01869 
01870     /* load file */
01871     BLI_make_file_string("/", filename, BLI_temporary_dir(), "quit.blend");
01872     WM_read_file(C, filename, op->reports);
01873 
01874     G.fileflags &= ~G_FILE_RECOVER;
01875     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01876 }
01877 
01878 static void WM_OT_recover_last_session(wmOperatorType *ot)
01879 {
01880     ot->name = "Recover Last Session";
01881     ot->idname = "WM_OT_recover_last_session";
01882     ot->description = "Open the last closed file (\"quit.blend\")";
01883     
01884     ot->exec = wm_recover_last_session_exec;
01885     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
01886 }

01891 {

01893 
01894     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01895 
01896     G.fileflags |= G_FILE_RECOVER;
01897 
01898     // XXX wm in context is not set correctly after WM_read_file -> crash
01899     // do it before for now, but is this correct with multiple windows?
01900     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01901 
01902     /* load file */
01903     WM_read_file(C, path, op->reports);
01904 
01905     G.fileflags &= ~G_FILE_RECOVER;
01906 
01907     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01908 }

01933 
01934 /* *************** save file as **************** */
01935 
01936 static void untitled(char *name)
01937 {
01938     if (G.save_over == 0 && strlen(name) < FILE_MAX - 16) {
01939         char *c = BLI_last_slash(name);
01940         
01941         if (c)
01942             strcpy(&c[1], "untitled.blend");
01943         else
01944             strcpy(name, "untitled.blend");
01945     }
01946 }
01947 
01948 static void save_set_compress(wmOperator *op)
01949 {
01950     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "compress")) {
01951         if (G.save_over) /* keep flag for existing file */
01952             RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "compress", G.fileflags & G_FILE_COMPRESS);
01953         else /* use userdef for new file */
01954             RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "compress", U.flag & USER_FILECOMPRESS);
01955     }
01956 }
01957 
01958 static int wm_save_as_mainfile_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01959 {
01960     char name[FILE_MAX];
01961 
01962     save_set_compress(op);
01963     
01964     /* if not saved before, get the name of the most recently used .blend file */
01965     if (G.main->name[0] == 0 && G.recent_files.first) {
01966         struct RecentFile *recent = G.recent_files.first;
01967         BLI_strncpy(name, recent->filepath, FILE_MAX);
01968     }
01969     else
01970         BLI_strncpy(name, G.main->name, FILE_MAX);
01971     
01972     untitled(name);
01973     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", name);
01974     
01975     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
01976 
01977     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01978 }
01979 
01980 /* function used for WM_OT_save_mainfile too */
01981 static int wm_save_as_mainfile_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01982 {
01983     char path[FILE_MAX];
01984     int fileflags;
01985     int copy = 0;
01986 
01987     save_set_compress(op);
01988     
01989     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
01990         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01991     else {
01992         BLI_strncpy(path, G.main->name, FILE_MAX);
01993         untitled(path);
01994     }
01995 
01996     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "copy"))
01997         copy = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "copy");
01998     
01999     fileflags = G.fileflags;
02000 
02001     /* set compression flag */
02002     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "compress")) fileflags |=  G_FILE_COMPRESS;
02003     else fileflags &= ~G_FILE_COMPRESS;
02004     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "relative_remap")) fileflags |=  G_FILE_RELATIVE_REMAP;
02005     else fileflags &= ~G_FILE_RELATIVE_REMAP;
02006 #ifdef USE_BMESH_SAVE_AS_COMPAT
02007     /* property only exists for 'Save As' */
02008     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "use_mesh_compat")) {
02009         if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_mesh_compat")) fileflags |=  G_FILE_MESH_COMPAT;
02010         else fileflags &= ~G_FILE_MESH_COMPAT;
02011     }
02012     else {
02013         fileflags &= ~G_FILE_MESH_COMPAT;
02014     }
02015 #endif
02016 
02017     if (WM_write_file(C, path, fileflags, op->reports, copy) != 0)
02018         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02019 
02020     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WM | ND_FILESAVE, NULL);
02021 
02022     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02023 }
02024 
02025 /* function used for WM_OT_save_mainfile too */
02026 static int blend_save_check(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
02027 {
02028     char filepath[FILE_MAX];
02029     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", filepath);
02030     if (!BLO_has_bfile_extension(filepath)) {
02031         /* some users would prefer BLI_replace_extension(),
02032          * we keep getting knit-picking bug reports about this - campbell */
02033         BLI_ensure_extension(filepath, FILE_MAX, ".blend");
02034         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", filepath);
02035         return TRUE;
02036     }
02037     return FALSE;
02038 }
02039 
02040 static void WM_OT_save_as_mainfile(wmOperatorType *ot)
02041 {
02042     ot->name = "Save As Blender File";
02043     ot->idname = "WM_OT_save_as_mainfile";
02044     ot->description = "Save the current file in the desired location";
02045     
02046     ot->invoke = wm_save_as_mainfile_invoke;
02047     ot->exec = wm_save_as_mainfile_exec;
02048     ot->check = blend_save_check;
02049     /* ommit window poll so this can work in background mode */
02050 
02051     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE | BLENDERFILE, FILE_BLENDER, FILE_SAVE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
02052     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "compress", 0, "Compress", "Write compressed .blend file");
02053     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "relative_remap", 1, "Remap Relative", "Remap relative paths when saving in a different directory");
02054     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "copy", 0, "Save Copy", "Save a copy of the actual working state but does not make saved file active");
02055 #ifdef USE_BMESH_SAVE_AS_COMPAT
02056     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_mesh_compat", 0, "Legacy Mesh Format", "Save using legacy mesh format (no ngons)");
02057 #endif
02058 }
02059 
02060 /* *************** save file directly ******** */
02061 
02062 static int wm_save_mainfile_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
02063 {
02064     char name[FILE_MAX];
02065     int check_existing = 1;
02066     int ret;
02067     
02068     /* cancel if no active window */
02069     if (CTX_wm_window(C) == NULL)
02070         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02071 
02072     save_set_compress(op);
02073 
02074     /* if not saved before, get the name of the most recently used .blend file */
02075     if (G.main->name[0] == 0 && G.recent_files.first) {
02076         struct RecentFile *recent = G.recent_files.first;
02077         BLI_strncpy(name, recent->filepath, FILE_MAX);
02078     }
02079     else
02080         BLI_strncpy(name, G.main->name, FILE_MAX);
02081 
02082     untitled(name);
02083     
02084     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", name);
02085     
02086     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "check_existing"))
02087         if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "check_existing") == 0)
02088             check_existing = 0;
02089     
02090     if (G.save_over) {
02091         if (check_existing && BLI_exists(name)) {
02092             uiPupMenuSaveOver(C, op, name);
02093             ret = OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02094         }
02095         else {
02096             ret = wm_save_as_mainfile_exec(C, op);
02097         }
02098     }
02099     else {
02100         WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
02101         ret = OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02102     }
02103     
02104     return ret;
02105 }
02106 
02107 static void WM_OT_save_mainfile(wmOperatorType *ot)
02108 {
02109     ot->name = "Save Blender File";
02110     ot->idname = "WM_OT_save_mainfile";
02111     ot->description = "Save the current Blender file";
02112     
02113     ot->invoke = wm_save_mainfile_invoke;
02114     ot->exec = wm_save_as_mainfile_exec;
02115     ot->check = blend_save_check;
02116     /* ommit window poll so this can work in background mode */
02117     
02118     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE | BLENDERFILE, FILE_BLENDER, FILE_SAVE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
02119     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "compress", 0, "Compress", "Write compressed .blend file");
02120     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "relative_remap", 0, "Remap Relative", "Remap relative paths when saving in a different directory");
02121 }

02128 static int wm_collada_export_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
02129 {   
02130     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
02131         char filepath[FILE_MAX];
02132         BLI_strncpy(filepath, G.main->name, sizeof(filepath));
02133         BLI_replace_extension(filepath, sizeof(filepath), ".dae");
02134         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", filepath);
02135     }
02136 
02137     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
02138 
02139     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02140 }
02141 
02142 /* function used for WM_OT_save_mainfile too */
02143 static int wm_collada_export_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02144 {
02145     char filename[FILE_MAX];
02146     int selected, second_life;
02147     
02148     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
02149         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No filename given");
02150         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02151     }
02152 
02153     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", filename);
02154     selected = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "selected");
02155     second_life = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "second_life");
02156     if (collada_export(CTX_data_scene(C), filename, selected, second_life)) {
02157         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02158     }
02159     else {
02160         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02161     }
02162 }

02175     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "selected", 0, "Export only selected",
02176                     "Export only selected elements");

02178                     "Compatibility mode for Second Life");

02181 /* function used for WM_OT_save_mainfile too */
02182 static int wm_collada_import_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02183 {
02184     char filename[FILE_MAX];
02185     
02186     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
02187         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No filename given");
02188         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02189     }
02190 
02191     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", filename);
02192     if (collada_import(C, filename)) return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02193     
02194     BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Errors found during parsing COLLADA document. Please see console for error log.");
02195     
02196     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02197 }

02210 }
