02247 /* *********************** */
02248 
02249 #if defined(WIN32)
02250 
02251 static int wm_console_toggle_op(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02252 {
02253     GHOST_toggleConsole(2);
02254     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02255 }
02256 
02257 static void WM_OT_console_toggle(wmOperatorType *ot)
02258 {
02259     /* XXX Have to mark these for xgettext, as under linux they do not exists...
02260      *     And even worth, have to give the context as text, as xgettext doesn't expand macros. :( */
02261     ot->name = CTX_N_("Operator"/* BLF_I18NCONTEXT_OPERATOR_DEFAULT */, "Toggle System Console");
02262     ot->idname = "WM_OT_console_toggle";
02263     ot->description = N_("Toggle System Console");
02264     
02265     ot->exec = wm_console_toggle_op;
02266     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
02267 }
02268 
02269 #endif
02270 
02271 /* ************ default paint cursors, draw always around cursor *********** */
02272 /*
02273  * - returns handler to free
02274  * - poll(bContext): returns 1 if draw should happen
02275  * - draw(bContext): drawing callback for paint cursor
02276  */
02277 
02278 void *WM_paint_cursor_activate(wmWindowManager *wm, int (*poll)(bContext *C),
02279                                wmPaintCursorDraw draw, void *customdata)
02280 {
02281     wmPaintCursor *pc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmPaintCursor), "paint cursor");
02282     
02283     BLI_addtail(&wm->paintcursors, pc);
02284     
02285     pc->customdata = customdata;
02286     pc->poll = poll;
02287     pc->draw = draw;
02288     
02289     return pc;
02290 }
02291 
02292 void WM_paint_cursor_end(wmWindowManager *wm, void *handle)
02293 {
02294     wmPaintCursor *pc;
02295     
02296     for (pc = wm->paintcursors.first; pc; pc = pc->next) {
02297         if (pc == (wmPaintCursor *)handle) {
02298             BLI_remlink(&wm->paintcursors, pc);
02299             MEM_freeN(pc);
02300             return;
02301         }
02302     }
02303 }
02304 
02305 /* ************ window gesture operator-callback definitions ************** */
02306 /*
02307  * These are default callbacks for use in operators requiring gesture input
02308  */
02309 
02310 /* **************** Border gesture *************** */
02311 
02312 /* Border gesture has two types:
02313  * 1) WM_GESTURE_CROSS_RECT: starts a cross, on mouse click it changes to border
02314  * 2) WM_GESTURE_RECT: starts immediate as a border, on mouse click or release it ends
02315  *
02316  * It stores 4 values (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax) and event it ended with (event_type)
02317  */
02318 
02319 static int border_apply_rect(wmOperator *op)
02320 {
02321     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02322     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02323     
02324     if (rect->xmin == rect->xmax || rect->ymin == rect->ymax)
02325         return 0;
02326 
02327     
02328     /* operator arguments and storage. */
02329     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "xmin", MIN2(rect->xmin, rect->xmax) );
02330     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "ymin", MIN2(rect->ymin, rect->ymax) );
02331     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "xmax", MAX2(rect->xmin, rect->xmax) );
02332     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "ymax", MAX2(rect->ymin, rect->ymax) );
02333 
02334     return 1;
02335 }
02336 
02337 static int border_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int gesture_mode)
02338 {
02339     if (!border_apply_rect(op))
02340         return 0;
02341     
02342     /* XXX weak; border should be configured for this without reading event types */
02343     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "gesture_mode") )
02344         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "gesture_mode", gesture_mode);
02345 
02346     op->type->exec(C, op);
02347     return 1;
02348 }
02349 
02350 static void wm_gesture_end(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02351 {
02352     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02353     
02354     WM_gesture_end(C, gesture); /* frees gesture itself, and unregisters from window */
02355     op->customdata = NULL;
02356 
02357     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
02358     
02359     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "cursor") )
02360         WM_cursor_restore(CTX_wm_window(C));
02361 }
02362 
02363 int WM_border_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02364 {
02365     if (ISTWEAK(event->type))
02366         op->customdata = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_RECT);
02367     else
02368         op->customdata = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_CROSS_RECT);
02369 
02370     /* add modal handler */
02371     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02372     
02373     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02374 
02375     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02376 }
02377 
02378 int WM_border_select_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02379 {
02380     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02381     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02382     int sx, sy;
02383     
02384     if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
02385         wm_subwindow_getorigin(CTX_wm_window(C), gesture->swinid, &sx, &sy);
02386 
02387         if (gesture->type == WM_GESTURE_CROSS_RECT && gesture->mode == 0) {
02388             rect->xmin = rect->xmax = event->x - sx;
02389             rect->ymin = rect->ymax = event->y - sy;
02390         }
02391         else {
02392             rect->xmax = event->x - sx;
02393             rect->ymax = event->y - sy;
02394         }
02395         border_apply_rect(op);
02396 
02397         wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02398     }
02399     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
02400         switch (event->val) {
02401             case GESTURE_MODAL_BEGIN:
02402                 if (gesture->type == WM_GESTURE_CROSS_RECT && gesture->mode == 0) {
02403                     gesture->mode = 1;
02404                     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02405                 }
02406                 break;
02407             case GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT:
02408             case GESTURE_MODAL_DESELECT:
02409             case GESTURE_MODAL_IN:
02410             case GESTURE_MODAL_OUT:
02411                 if (border_apply(C, op, event->val)) {
02412                     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02413                     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02414                 }
02415                 wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02416                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02417                 break;
02418 
02419             case GESTURE_MODAL_CANCEL:
02420                 wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02421                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02422         }
02423 
02424     }
02425 //  // Allow view navigation???
02426 //  else {
02427 //      return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02428 //  }
02429 
02430     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02431 }
02432 
02433 int WM_border_select_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02434 {
02435     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02436 
02437     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02438 }
02439 
02440 /* **************** circle gesture *************** */
02441 /* works now only for selection or modal paint stuff, calls exec while hold mouse, exit on release */
02442 
02443 #ifdef GESTURE_MEMORY
02444 int circle_select_size = 25; // XXX - need some operator memory thing\!
02445 #endif
02446 
02447 int WM_gesture_circle_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02448 {
02449     op->customdata = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_CIRCLE);
02450     
02451     /* add modal handler */
02452     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02453     
02454     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02455     
02456     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02457 }
02458 
02459 static void gesture_circle_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02460 {
02461     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02462     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02463     
02464     if (RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode") == GESTURE_MODAL_NOP)
02465         return;
02466 
02467     /* operator arguments and storage. */
02468     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "x", rect->xmin);
02469     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "y", rect->ymin);
02470     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "radius", rect->xmax);
02471     
02472     if (op->type->exec)
02473         op->type->exec(C, op);
02474 #ifdef GESTURE_MEMORY
02475     circle_select_size = rect->xmax;
02476 #endif
02477 }
02478 
02479 int WM_gesture_circle_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02480 {
02481     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02482     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02483     int sx, sy;
02484 
02485     if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
02486         wm_subwindow_getorigin(CTX_wm_window(C), gesture->swinid, &sx, &sy);
02487 
02488         rect->xmin = event->x - sx;
02489         rect->ymin = event->y - sy;
02490 
02491         wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02492 
02493         if (gesture->mode)
02494             gesture_circle_apply(C, op);
02495     }
02496     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
02497         switch (event->val) {
02498             case GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_ADD:
02499                 rect->xmax += 2 + rect->xmax / 10;
02500                 wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02501                 break;
02502             case GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_SUB:
02503                 rect->xmax -= 2 + rect->xmax / 10;
02504                 if (rect->xmax < 1) rect->xmax = 1;
02505                 wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02506                 break;
02507             case GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT:
02508             case GESTURE_MODAL_DESELECT:
02509             case GESTURE_MODAL_NOP:
02510                 if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "gesture_mode"))
02511                     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "gesture_mode", event->val);
02512 
02513                 if (event->val != GESTURE_MODAL_NOP) {
02514                     /* apply first click */
02515                     gesture_circle_apply(C, op);
02516                     gesture->mode = 1;
02517                     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02518                 }
02519                 break;
02520 
02521             case GESTURE_MODAL_CANCEL:
02522             case GESTURE_MODAL_CONFIRM:
02523                 wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02524                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED; /* use finish or we don't get an undo */
02525         }
02526     }
02527 //  // Allow view navigation???
02528 //  else {
02529 //      return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02530 //  }
02531 
02532     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02533 }
02534 
02535 int WM_gesture_circle_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02536 {
02537     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02538 
02539     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02540 }
02541 
02542 #if 0
02543 /* template to copy from */
02544 void WM_OT_circle_gesture(wmOperatorType *ot)
02545 {
02546     ot->name = "Circle Gesture";
02547     ot->idname = "WM_OT_circle_gesture";
02548     ot->description = "Enter rotate mode with a circular gesture";
02549     
02550     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_circle_invoke;
02551     ot->modal = WM_gesture_circle_modal;
02552     
02553     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
02554     
02555     RNA_def_property(ot->srna, "x", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
02556     RNA_def_property(ot->srna, "y", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
02557     RNA_def_property(ot->srna, "radius", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
02558 
02559 }
02560 #endif
02561 
02562 /* **************** Tweak gesture *************** */
02563 
02564 static void tweak_gesture_modal(bContext *C, wmEvent *event)
02565 {
02566     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
02567     wmGesture *gesture = window->tweak;
02568     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02569     int sx, sy, val;
02570     
02571     switch (event->type) {
02572         case MOUSEMOVE:
02573         case INBETWEEN_MOUSEMOVE:
02574             
02575             wm_subwindow_getorigin(window, gesture->swinid, &sx, &sy);
02576             
02577             rect->xmax = event->x - sx;
02578             rect->ymax = event->y - sy;
02579             
02580             if ((val = wm_gesture_evaluate(gesture))) {
02581                 wmEvent tevent;
02582 
02583                 tevent = *(window->eventstate);
02584                 if (gesture->event_type == LEFTMOUSE)
02585                     tevent.type = EVT_TWEAK_L;
02586                 else if (gesture->event_type == RIGHTMOUSE)
02587                     tevent.type = EVT_TWEAK_R;
02588                 else
02589                     tevent.type = EVT_TWEAK_M;
02590                 tevent.val = val;
02591                 /* mouse coords! */
02592                 wm_event_add(window, &tevent);
02593                 
02594                 WM_gesture_end(C, gesture); /* frees gesture itself, and unregisters from window */
02595             }
02596             
02597             break;
02598             
02599         case LEFTMOUSE:
02600         case RIGHTMOUSE:
02601         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
02602             if (gesture->event_type == event->type) {
02603                 WM_gesture_end(C, gesture);
02604 
02605                 /* when tweak fails we should give the other keymap entries a chance */
02606                 event->val = KM_RELEASE;
02607             }
02608             break;
02609         default:
02610             if (!ISTIMER(event->type)) {
02611                 WM_gesture_end(C, gesture);
02612             }
02613             break;
02614     }
02615 }
02616 
02617 /* standard tweak, called after window handlers passed on event */
02618 void wm_tweakevent_test(bContext *C, wmEvent *event, int action)
02619 {
02620     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
02621     
02622     if (win->tweak == NULL) {
02623         if (CTX_wm_region(C)) {
02624             if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
02625                 if (ELEM3(event->type, LEFTMOUSE, MIDDLEMOUSE, RIGHTMOUSE) )
02626                     win->tweak = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_TWEAK);
02627             }
02628         }
02629     }
02630     else {
02631         /* no tweaks if event was handled */
02632         if ((action & WM_HANDLER_BREAK)) {
02633             WM_gesture_end(C, win->tweak);
02634         }
02635         else
02636             tweak_gesture_modal(C, event);
02637     }
02638 }
02639 
02640 /* *********************** lasso gesture ****************** */
02641 
02642 int WM_gesture_lasso_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02643 {
02644     op->customdata = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_LASSO);
02645     
02646     /* add modal handler */
02647     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02648     
02649     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02650     
02651     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "cursor") )
02652         WM_cursor_modal(CTX_wm_window(C), RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "cursor"));
02653     
02654     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02655 }
02656 
02657 int WM_gesture_lines_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02658 {
02659     op->customdata = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_LINES);
02660     
02661     /* add modal handler */
02662     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02663     
02664     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02665     
02666     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "cursor") )
02667         WM_cursor_modal(CTX_wm_window(C), RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "cursor"));
02668     
02669     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02670 }
02671 
02672 
02673 static void gesture_lasso_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02674 {
02675     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02676     PointerRNA itemptr;
02677     float loc[2];
02678     int i;
02679     short *lasso = gesture->customdata;
02680     
02681     /* operator storage as path. */
02682 
02683     RNA_collection_clear(op->ptr, "path");
02684     for (i = 0; i < gesture->points; i++, lasso += 2) {
02685         loc[0] = lasso[0];
02686         loc[1] = lasso[1];
02687         RNA_collection_add(op->ptr, "path", &itemptr);
02688         RNA_float_set_array(&itemptr, "loc", loc);
02689     }
02690     
02691     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02692         
02693     if (op->type->exec)
02694         op->type->exec(C, op);
02695 }
02696 
02697 int WM_gesture_lasso_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02698 {
02699     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02700     int sx, sy;
02701     
02702     switch (event->type) {
02703         case MOUSEMOVE:
02704         case INBETWEEN_MOUSEMOVE:
02705             
02706             wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02707             
02708             wm_subwindow_getorigin(CTX_wm_window(C), gesture->swinid, &sx, &sy);
02709 
02710             if (gesture->points == gesture->size) {
02711                 short *old_lasso = gesture->customdata;
02712                 gesture->customdata = MEM_callocN(2 * sizeof(short) * (gesture->size + WM_LASSO_MIN_POINTS), "lasso points");
02713                 memcpy(gesture->customdata, old_lasso, 2 * sizeof(short) * gesture->size);
02714                 gesture->size = gesture->size + WM_LASSO_MIN_POINTS;
02715                 MEM_freeN(old_lasso);
02716                 // printf("realloc\n");
02717             }
02718 
02719             {
02720                 int x, y;
02721                 short *lasso = gesture->customdata;
02722                 
02723                 lasso += (2 * gesture->points - 2);
02724                 x = (event->x - sx - lasso[0]);
02725                 y = (event->y - sy - lasso[1]);
02726                 
02727                 /* make a simple distance check to get a smoother lasso
02728                  * add only when at least 2 pixels between this and previous location */
02729                 if ((x * x + y * y) > 4) {
02730                     lasso += 2;
02731                     lasso[0] = event->x - sx;
02732                     lasso[1] = event->y - sy;
02733                     gesture->points++;
02734                 }
02735             }
02736             break;
02737             
02738         case LEFTMOUSE:
02739         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
02740         case RIGHTMOUSE:
02741             if (event->val == KM_RELEASE) {   /* key release */
02742                 gesture_lasso_apply(C, op);
02743                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02744             }
02745             break;
02746         case ESCKEY:
02747             wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02748             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02749     }
02750     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02751 }
02752 
02753 int WM_gesture_lines_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02754 {
02755     return WM_gesture_lasso_modal(C, op, event);
02756 }
02757 
02758 int WM_gesture_lasso_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02759 {
02760     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02761 
02762     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02763 }
02764 
02765 int WM_gesture_lines_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02766 {
02767     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02768 
02769     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02770 }
02771 
02772 #if 0
02773 /* template to copy from */
02774 
02775 static int gesture_lasso_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02776 {
02777     RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "path")
02778     {
02779         float loc[2];
02780         
02781         RNA_float_get_array(&itemptr, "loc", loc);
02782         printf("Location: %f %f\n", loc[0], loc[1]);
02783     }
02784     RNA_END;
02785     
02786     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02787 }
02788 
02789 void WM_OT_lasso_gesture(wmOperatorType *ot)
02790 {
02791     PropertyRNA *prop;
02792     
02793     ot->name = "Lasso Gesture";
02794     ot->idname = "WM_OT_lasso_gesture";
02795     ot->description = "Select objects within the lasso as you move the pointer";
02796     
02797     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_lasso_invoke;
02798     ot->modal = WM_gesture_lasso_modal;
02799     ot->exec = gesture_lasso_exec;
02800     
02801     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
02802     
02803     prop = RNA_def_property(ot->srna, "path", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02804     RNA_def_property_struct_runtime(prop, &RNA_OperatorMousePath);
02805 }
02806 #endif
02807 
02808 /* *********************** straight line gesture ****************** */
02809 
02810 static int straightline_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02811 {
02812     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02813     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02814     
02815     if (rect->xmin == rect->xmax && rect->ymin == rect->ymax)
02816         return 0;
02817     
02818     /* operator arguments and storage. */
02819     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "xstart", rect->xmin);
02820     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "ystart", rect->ymin);
02821     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "xend", rect->xmax);
02822     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "yend", rect->ymax);
02823 
02824     if (op->type->exec)
02825         op->type->exec(C, op);
02826     
02827     return 1;
02828 }
02829 
02830 
02831 int WM_gesture_straightline_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02832 {
02833     op->customdata = WM_gesture_new(C, event, WM_GESTURE_STRAIGHTLINE);
02834     
02835     /* add modal handler */
02836     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02837     
02838     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02839     
02840     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "cursor") )
02841         WM_cursor_modal(CTX_wm_window(C), RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "cursor"));
02842         
02843     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02844 }
02845 
02846 int WM_gesture_straightline_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02847 {
02848     wmGesture *gesture = op->customdata;
02849     rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
02850     int sx, sy;
02851     
02852     if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
02853         wm_subwindow_getorigin(CTX_wm_window(C), gesture->swinid, &sx, &sy);
02854         
02855         if (gesture->mode == 0) {
02856             rect->xmin = rect->xmax = event->x - sx;
02857             rect->ymin = rect->ymax = event->y - sy;
02858         }
02859         else {
02860             rect->xmax = event->x - sx;
02861             rect->ymax = event->y - sy;
02862             straightline_apply(C, op);
02863         }
02864         
02865         wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02866     }
02867     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
02868         switch (event->val) {
02869             case GESTURE_MODAL_BEGIN:
02870                 if (gesture->mode == 0) {
02871                     gesture->mode = 1;
02872                     wm_gesture_tag_redraw(C);
02873                 }
02874                 break;
02875             case GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT:
02876                 if (straightline_apply(C, op)) {
02877                     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02878                     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02879                 }
02880                 wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02881                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02882                 break;
02883                 
02884             case GESTURE_MODAL_CANCEL:
02885                 wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02886                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02887         }
02888         
02889     }
02890 
02891     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02892 }
02893 
02894 int WM_gesture_straightline_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02895 {
02896     wm_gesture_end(C, op);
02897 
02898     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02899 }
02900 
02901 #if 0
02902 /* template to copy from */
02903 void WM_OT_straightline_gesture(wmOperatorType *ot)
02904 {
02905     PropertyRNA *prop;
02906     
02907     ot->name = "Straight Line Gesture";
02908     ot->idname = "WM_OT_straightline_gesture";
02909     ot->description = "Draw a straight line as you move the pointer";

02912     ot->modal = WM_gesture_straightline_modal;
02913     ot->exec = gesture_straightline_exec;

02917     WM_operator_properties_gesture_straightline(ot, 0);

02920 
02921 /* *********************** radial control ****************** */
02922 
02923 static const int WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE = 200;
02924 
02925 typedef struct {
02926     PropertyType type;
02927     PropertySubType subtype;
02928     PointerRNA ptr, col_ptr, fill_col_ptr, rot_ptr, zoom_ptr, image_id_ptr;
02929     PropertyRNA *prop, *col_prop, *fill_col_prop, *rot_prop, *zoom_prop;
02930     StructRNA *image_id_srna;
02931     float initial_value, current_value, min_value, max_value;
02932     int initial_mouse[2];
02933     unsigned int gltex;
02934     ListBase orig_paintcursors;
02935     void *cursor;
02936 } RadialControl;
02937 
02938 static void radial_control_set_initial_mouse(RadialControl *rc, wmEvent *event)
02939 {
02940     float d[2] = {0, 0};
02941     float zoom[2] = {1, 1};
02942 
02943     rc->initial_mouse[0] = event->x;
02944     rc->initial_mouse[1] = event->y;
02945 
02946     switch (rc->subtype) {
02947         case PROP_DISTANCE:
02948             d[0] = rc->initial_value;
02949             break;
02950         case PROP_FACTOR:
02951             d[0] = WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE * (1 - rc->initial_value);
02952             break;
02953         case PROP_ANGLE:
02954             d[0] = WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE * cos(rc->initial_value);
02955             d[1] = WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE * sin(rc->initial_value);
02956             break;
02957         default:
02958             return;
02959     }
02960 
02961     if (rc->zoom_prop) {
02962         RNA_property_float_get_array(&rc->zoom_ptr, rc->zoom_prop, zoom);
02963         d[0] *= zoom[0];
02964         d[1] *= zoom[1];
02965     }
02966 
02967     rc->initial_mouse[0] -= d[0];
02968     rc->initial_mouse[1] -= d[1];
02969 }
02970 
02971 static void radial_control_set_tex(RadialControl *rc)
02972 {
02973     ImBuf *ibuf;
02974 
02975     switch (RNA_type_to_ID_code(rc->image_id_ptr.type)) {
02976         case ID_BR:
02977             if ((ibuf = brush_gen_radial_control_imbuf(rc->image_id_ptr.data))) {
02978                 glGenTextures(1, &rc->gltex);
02979                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, rc->gltex);
02980                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_ALPHA, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, 0,
02981                              GL_ALPHA, GL_FLOAT, ibuf->rect_float);
02982                 MEM_freeN(ibuf->rect_float);
02983                 MEM_freeN(ibuf);
02984             }
02985             break;
02986         default:
02987             break;
02988     }
02989 }
02990 
02991 static void radial_control_paint_tex(RadialControl *rc, float radius, float alpha)
02992 {
02993     float col[3] = {0, 0, 0};
02994     float rot;
02995 
02996     /* set fill color */
02997     if (rc->fill_col_prop)
02998         RNA_property_float_get_array(&rc->fill_col_ptr, rc->fill_col_prop, col);
02999     glColor4f(col[0], col[1], col[2], alpha);
03000 
03001     if (rc->gltex) {
03002         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, rc->gltex);
03003 
03004         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
03005         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
03006 
03007         /* set up rotation if available */
03008         if (rc->rot_prop) {
03009             rot = RNA_property_float_get(&rc->rot_ptr, rc->rot_prop);
03010             glPushMatrix();
03011             glRotatef(RAD2DEGF(rot), 0, 0, 1);
03012         }
03013 
03014         /* draw textured quad */
03015         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
03016         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
03017         glTexCoord2f(0, 0);
03018         glVertex2f(-radius, -radius);
03019         glTexCoord2f(1, 0);
03020         glVertex2f(radius, -radius);
03021         glTexCoord2f(1, 1);
03022         glVertex2f(radius, radius);
03023         glTexCoord2f(0, 1);
03024         glVertex2f(-radius, radius);
03025         glEnd();
03026         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
03027 
03028         /* undo rotation */
03029         if (rc->rot_prop)
03030             glPopMatrix();
03031     }
03032     else {
03033         /* flat color if no texture available */
03034         glutil_draw_filled_arc(0, M_PI * 2, radius, 40);
03035     }
03036 }
03037 
03038 static void radial_control_paint_cursor(bContext *C, int x, int y, void *customdata)
03039 {
03040     RadialControl *rc = customdata;
03041     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03042     float r1 = 0.0f, r2 = 0.0f, tex_radius, alpha;
03043     float zoom[2], col[3] = {1, 1, 1};
03044 
03045     switch (rc->subtype) {
03046         case PROP_DISTANCE:
03047             r1 = rc->current_value;
03048             r2 = rc->initial_value;
03049             tex_radius = r1;
03050             alpha = 0.75;
03051             break;
03052         case PROP_FACTOR:
03053             r1 = (1 - rc->current_value) * WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE;
03054             r2 = tex_radius = WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE;
03055             alpha = rc->current_value / 2.0f + 0.5f;
03056             break;
03057         case PROP_ANGLE:
03058             r1 = r2 = tex_radius = WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE;
03059             alpha = 0.75;
03060             break;
03061         default:
03062             tex_radius = WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE; /* note, this is a dummy value */
03063             alpha = 0.75;
03064             break;
03065     }
03066 
03067     /* Keep cursor in the original place */
03068     x = rc->initial_mouse[0] - ar->winrct.xmin;
03069     y = rc->initial_mouse[1] - ar->winrct.ymin;
03070     glTranslatef((float)x, (float)y, 0.0f);
03071 
03072     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
03073     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
03074 
03075     /* apply zoom if available */
03076     if (rc->zoom_prop) {
03077         RNA_property_float_get_array(&rc->zoom_ptr, rc->zoom_prop, zoom);
03078         glScalef(zoom[0], zoom[1], 1);
03079     }
03080 
03081     /* draw rotated texture */
03082     radial_control_paint_tex(rc, tex_radius, alpha);
03083 
03084     /* set line color */
03085     if (rc->col_prop)
03086         RNA_property_float_get_array(&rc->col_ptr, rc->col_prop, col);
03087     glColor4f(col[0], col[1], col[2], 0.5);
03088 
03089     if (rc->subtype == PROP_ANGLE) {
03090         glPushMatrix();
03091         /* draw original angle line */
03092         glRotatef(RAD2DEGF(rc->initial_value), 0, 0, 1);
03093         fdrawline(0.0f, 0.0f, (float)WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE, 0.0f);
03094         /* draw new angle line */
03095         glRotatef(RAD2DEGF(rc->current_value - rc->initial_value), 0, 0, 1);
03096         fdrawline(0.0f, 0.0f, (float)WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE, 0.0f);
03097         glPopMatrix();
03098     }
03099 
03100     /* draw circles on top */
03101     glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0, (float)(M_PI * 2.0), r1, 40);
03102     glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0, (float)(M_PI * 2.0), r2, 40);
03103 
03104     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
03105     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
03106 }
03107 
03108 typedef enum {
03109     RC_PROP_ALLOW_MISSING = 1,
03110     RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT = 2,
03111     RC_PROP_REQUIRE_BOOL = 4,
03112 } RCPropFlags;
03113 
03114 /* attempt to retrieve the rna pointer/property from an rna path;
03115  * returns 0 for failure, 1 for success, and also 1 if property is not
03116  * set */
03117 static int radial_control_get_path(PointerRNA *ctx_ptr, wmOperator *op,
03118                                    const char *name, PointerRNA *r_ptr,
03119                                    PropertyRNA **r_prop, int req_length, RCPropFlags flags)
03120 {
03121     PropertyRNA *unused_prop;
03122     int len;
03123     char *str;
03124 
03125     /* check flags */
03126     if ((flags & RC_PROP_REQUIRE_BOOL) && (flags & RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT)) {
03127         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Property can't be both boolean and float");
03128         return 0;
03129     }
03130 
03131     /* get an rna string path from the operator's properties */
03132     if (!(str = RNA_string_get_alloc(op->ptr, name, NULL, 0)))
03133         return 1;
03134 
03135     if (str[0] == '\0') {
03136         if (r_prop) *r_prop = NULL;
03137         MEM_freeN(str);
03138         return 1;
03139     }
03140 
03141     if (!r_prop)
03142         r_prop = &unused_prop;
03143 
03144     /* get rna from path */
03145     if (!RNA_path_resolve(ctx_ptr, str, r_ptr, r_prop)) {
03146         MEM_freeN(str);
03147         if (flags & RC_PROP_ALLOW_MISSING)
03148             return 1;
03149         else {
03150             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't resolve path %s", name);
03151             return 0;
03152         }
03153     }
03154 
03155     /* check property type */
03156     if (flags & (RC_PROP_REQUIRE_BOOL | RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT)) {
03157         PropertyType prop_type = RNA_property_type(*r_prop);
03158 
03159         if (((flags & RC_PROP_REQUIRE_BOOL) && (prop_type != PROP_BOOLEAN)) ||
03160             ((flags & RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT) && prop_type != PROP_FLOAT)) {
03161             MEM_freeN(str);
03162             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
03163                         "Property from path %s is not a float", name);
03164             return 0;
03165         }
03166     }
03167     
03168     /* check property's array length */
03169     if (*r_prop && (len = RNA_property_array_length(r_ptr, *r_prop)) != req_length) {
03170         MEM_freeN(str);
03171         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
03172                     "Property from path %s has length %d instead of %d",
03173                     name, len, req_length);
03174         return 0;
03175     }
03176 
03177     /* success */
03178     MEM_freeN(str);
03179     return 1;
03180 }
03181 
03182 /* initialize the rna pointers and properties using rna paths */
03183 static int radial_control_get_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03184 {
03185     RadialControl *rc = op->customdata;
03186     PointerRNA ctx_ptr, use_secondary_ptr;
03187     PropertyRNA *use_secondary_prop;
03188     const char *data_path;
03189 
03190     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_Context, C, &ctx_ptr);
03191 
03192     /* check if we use primary or secondary path */
03193     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, "use_secondary",
03194                                  &use_secondary_ptr, &use_secondary_prop,
03195                                  0, (RC_PROP_ALLOW_MISSING |
03196                                      RC_PROP_REQUIRE_BOOL)))
03197     {
03198         return 0;
03199     }
03200     else {
03201         if (use_secondary_prop &&
03202             RNA_property_boolean_get(&use_secondary_ptr, use_secondary_prop))
03203             data_path = "data_path_secondary";
03204         else
03205             data_path = "data_path_primary";
03206     }
03207 
03208     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, data_path, &rc->ptr, &rc->prop, 0, 0))
03209         return 0;
03210 
03211     /* data path is required */
03212     if (!rc->prop)
03213         return 0;
03214     
03215     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, "rotation_path", &rc->rot_ptr, &rc->rot_prop, 0, RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT))
03216         return 0;
03217     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, "color_path", &rc->col_ptr, &rc->col_prop, 3, RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT))
03218         return 0;
03219     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, "fill_color_path", &rc->fill_col_ptr, &rc->fill_col_prop, 3, RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT))
03220         return 0;
03221     
03222     /* slightly ugly; allow this property to not resolve
03223      * correctly. needed because 3d texture paint shares the same
03224      * keymap as 2d image paint */
03225     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, "zoom_path",
03226                                  &rc->zoom_ptr, &rc->zoom_prop, 2,
03227                                  RC_PROP_REQUIRE_FLOAT | RC_PROP_ALLOW_MISSING))
03228         return 0;
03229     
03230     if (!radial_control_get_path(&ctx_ptr, op, "image_id", &rc->image_id_ptr, NULL, 0, 0))
03231         return 0;
03232     else if (rc->image_id_ptr.data) {
03233         /* extra check, pointer must be to an ID */
03234         if (!RNA_struct_is_ID(rc->image_id_ptr.type)) {
03235             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
03236                        "Pointer from path image_id is not an ID");
03237             return 0;
03238         }
03239     }
03240 
03241     return 1;
03242 }
03243 
03244 static int radial_control_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03245 {
03246     wmWindowManager *wm;
03247     RadialControl *rc;
03248     int min_value_int, max_value_int, step_int;
03249     float step_float, precision;
03250 
03251     if (!(op->customdata = rc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RadialControl), "RadialControl")))
03252         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03253 
03254     if (!radial_control_get_properties(C, op)) {
03255         MEM_freeN(rc);
03256         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03257     }
03258 
03259     /* get type, initial, min, and max values of the property */
03260     switch ((rc->type = RNA_property_type(rc->prop))) {
03261         case PROP_INT:
03262             rc->initial_value = RNA_property_int_get(&rc->ptr, rc->prop);
03263             RNA_property_int_ui_range(&rc->ptr, rc->prop, &min_value_int,
03264                                       &max_value_int, &step_int);
03265             rc->min_value = min_value_int;
03266             rc->max_value = max_value_int;
03267             break;
03268         case PROP_FLOAT:
03269             rc->initial_value = RNA_property_float_get(&rc->ptr, rc->prop);
03270             RNA_property_float_ui_range(&rc->ptr, rc->prop, &rc->min_value,
03271                                         &rc->max_value, &step_float, &precision);
03272             break;
03273         default:
03274             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Property must be an integer or a float");
03275             MEM_freeN(rc);
03276             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03277     }
03278 
03279     /* get subtype of property */
03280     rc->subtype = RNA_property_subtype(rc->prop);
03281     if (!ELEM3(rc->subtype, PROP_DISTANCE, PROP_FACTOR, PROP_ANGLE)) {
03282         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Property must be a distance, a factor, or an angle");
03283         MEM_freeN(rc);
03284         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03285     }
03286         
03287     rc->current_value = rc->initial_value;
03288     radial_control_set_initial_mouse(rc, event);
03289     radial_control_set_tex(rc);
03290 
03291     /* temporarily disable other paint cursors */
03292     wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
03293     rc->orig_paintcursors = wm->paintcursors;
03294     wm->paintcursors.first = wm->paintcursors.last = NULL;
03295 
03296     /* add radial control paint cursor */
03297     rc->cursor = WM_paint_cursor_activate(wm, op->type->poll,
03298                                           radial_control_paint_cursor, rc);
03299 
03300     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
03301 
03302     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
03303 }
03304 
03305 static void radial_control_set_value(RadialControl *rc, float val)
03306 {
03307     switch (rc->type) {
03308         case PROP_INT:
03309             RNA_property_int_set(&rc->ptr, rc->prop, val);
03310             break;
03311         case PROP_FLOAT:
03312             RNA_property_float_set(&rc->ptr, rc->prop, val);
03313             break;
03314         default:
03315             break;
03316     }
03317 }
03318 
03319 static int radial_control_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03320 {
03321     RadialControl *rc = op->customdata;
03322     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
03323 
03324     WM_paint_cursor_end(wm, rc->cursor);
03325 
03326     /* restore original paint cursors */
03327     wm->paintcursors = rc->orig_paintcursors;
03328 
03329     /* not sure if this is a good notifier to use;
03330      * intended purpose is to update the UI so that the
03331      * new value is displayed in sliders/numfields */
03332     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
03333 
03334     glDeleteTextures(1, &rc->gltex);
03335 
03336     MEM_freeN(rc);
03337 
03338     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03339 }
03340 
03341 static int radial_control_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03342 {
03343     RadialControl *rc = op->customdata;
03344     float new_value, dist, zoom[2];
03345     float delta[2], snap, ret = OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
03346 
03347     /* TODO: fix hardcoded events */
03348 
03349     snap = event->ctrl;
03350 
03351     switch (event->type) {
03352         case MOUSEMOVE:
03353             delta[0] = rc->initial_mouse[0] - event->x;
03354             delta[1] = rc->initial_mouse[1] - event->y;
03355 
03356             if (rc->zoom_prop) {
03357                 RNA_property_float_get_array(&rc->zoom_ptr, rc->zoom_prop, zoom);
03358                 delta[0] /= zoom[0];
03359                 delta[1] /= zoom[1];
03360             }
03361 
03362             dist = sqrt(delta[0] * delta[0] + delta[1] * delta[1]);
03363 
03364             /* calculate new value and apply snapping  */
03365             switch (rc->subtype) {
03366                 case PROP_DISTANCE:
03367                     new_value = dist;
03368                     if (snap) new_value = ((int)new_value + 5) / 10 * 10;
03369                     break;
03370                 case PROP_FACTOR:
03371                     new_value = 1 - dist / WM_RADIAL_CONTROL_DISPLAY_SIZE;
03372                     if (snap) new_value = ((int)ceil(new_value * 10.f) * 10.0f) / 100.f;
03373                     break;
03374                 case PROP_ANGLE:
03375                     new_value = atan2(delta[1], delta[0]) + M_PI;
03376                     if (snap) new_value = DEG2RADF(((int)RAD2DEGF(new_value) + 5) / 10 * 10);
03377                     break;
03378                 default:
03379                     new_value = dist; /* dummy value, should this ever happen? - campbell */
03380                     break;
03381             }
03382 
03383             /* clamp and update */
03384             CLAMP(new_value, rc->min_value, rc->max_value);
03385             radial_control_set_value(rc, new_value);
03386             rc->current_value = new_value;
03387             break;
03388 
03389         case ESCKEY:
03390         case RIGHTMOUSE:
03391             /* canceled; restore original value */
03392             radial_control_set_value(rc, rc->initial_value);
03393             ret = OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03394             break;
03395 
03396         case LEFTMOUSE:
03397         case PADENTER:
03398             /* done; value already set */
03399             ret = OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03400             break;
03401     }
03402 
03403     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
03404 
03405     if (ret != OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL)
03406         radial_control_cancel(C, op);
03407 
03408     return ret;
03409 }
03410 
03411 static void WM_OT_radial_control(wmOperatorType *ot)
03412 {
03413     ot->name = "Radial Control";
03414     ot->idname = "WM_OT_radial_control";
03415 
03416     ot->invoke = radial_control_invoke;
03417     ot->modal = radial_control_modal;
03418     ot->cancel = radial_control_cancel;
03419 
03420     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
03421 
03422     /* all paths relative to the context */
03423     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "data_path_primary", "", 0, "Primary Data Path", "Primary path of property to be set by the radial control");
03424     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "data_path_secondary", "", 0, "Secondary Data Path", "Secondary path of property to be set by the radial control");
03425     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "use_secondary", "", 0, "Use Secondary", "Path of property to select between the primary and secondary data paths");
03426     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "rotation_path", "", 0, "Rotation Path", "Path of property used to rotate the texture display");
03427     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "color_path", "", 0, "Color Path", "Path of property used to set the color of the control");
03428     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "fill_color_path", "", 0, "Fill Color Path", "Path of property used to set the fill color of the control");
03429     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "zoom_path", "", 0, "Zoom Path", "Path of property used to set the zoom level for the control");
03430     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "image_id", "", 0, "Image ID", "Path of ID that is used to generate an image for the control");
03431 }
03432 
03433 /* ************************** timer for testing ***************** */
03434 
03435 /* uses no type defines, fully local testing function anyway... ;) */
03436 
03437 static void redraw_timer_window_swap(bContext *C)
03438 {
03439     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
03440     ScrArea *sa;
03441 
03442     for (sa = CTX_wm_screen(C)->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next)
03443         ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
03444     wm_draw_update(C);
03445 
03446     CTX_wm_window_set(C, win);  /* XXX context manipulation warning! */
03447 }
03448 
03449 static EnumPropertyItem redraw_timer_type_items[] = {
03450     {0, "DRAW", 0, "Draw Region", "Draw Region"},
03451     {1, "DRAW_SWAP", 0, "Draw Region + Swap", "Draw Region and Swap"},
03452     {2, "DRAW_WIN", 0, "Draw Window", "Draw Window"},
03453     {3, "DRAW_WIN_SWAP", 0, "Draw Window + Swap", "Draw Window and Swap"},
03454     {4, "ANIM_STEP", 0, "Anim Step", "Animation Steps"},
03455     {5, "ANIM_PLAY", 0, "Anim Play", "Animation Playback"},
03456     {6, "UNDO", 0, "Undo/Redo", "Undo/Redo"},
03457     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
03458 };
03459 
03460 static int redraw_timer_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03461 {
03462     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03463     double stime = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
03464     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
03465     int iter = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "iterations");
03466     int a;
03467     float time;
03468     const char *infostr = "";
03469     
03470     WM_cursor_wait(1);
03471 
03472     for (a = 0; a < iter; a++) {
03473         if (type == 0) {
03474             if (ar)
03475                 ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
03476         } 
03477         else if (type == 1) {
03478             wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
03479             
03480             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
03481             wm_draw_update(C);
03482             
03483             CTX_wm_window_set(C, win);  /* XXX context manipulation warning! */
03484         }
03485         else if (type == 2) {
03486             wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
03487             ScrArea *sa;
03488             
03489             ScrArea *sa_back = CTX_wm_area(C);
03490             ARegion *ar_back = CTX_wm_region(C);
03491 
03492             for (sa = CTX_wm_screen(C)->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
03493                 ARegion *ar_iter;
03494                 CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
03495 
03496                 for (ar_iter = sa->regionbase.first; ar_iter; ar_iter = ar_iter->next) {
03497                     if (ar_iter->swinid) {
03498                         CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar_iter);
03499                         ED_region_do_draw(C, ar_iter);
03500                     }
03501                 }
03502             }
03503 
03504             CTX_wm_window_set(C, win);  /* XXX context manipulation warning! */
03505 
03506             CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa_back);
03507             CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar_back);
03508         }
03509         else if (type == 3) {
03510             redraw_timer_window_swap(C);
03511         }
03512         else if (type == 4) {
03513             Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
03514             Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03515             
03516             if (a & 1) scene->r.cfra--;
03517             else scene->r.cfra++;
03518             scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, scene->lay);
03519         }
03520         else if (type == 5) {
03521 
03522             /* play anim, return on same frame as started with */
03523             Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
03524             Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03525             int tot = (scene->r.efra - scene->r.sfra) + 1;
03526 
03527             while (tot--) {
03528                 /* todo, ability to escape! */
03529                 scene->r.cfra++;
03530                 if (scene->r.cfra > scene->r.efra)
03531                     scene->r.cfra = scene->r.sfra;
03532 
03533                 scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, scene->lay);
03534                 redraw_timer_window_swap(C);
03535             }
03536         }
03537         else { /* 6 */
03538             ED_undo_pop(C);
03539             ED_undo_redo(C);
03540         }
03541     }
03542     
03543     time = (float)((PIL_check_seconds_timer() - stime) * 1000);
03544 
03545     RNA_enum_description(redraw_timer_type_items, type, &infostr);
03546 
03547     WM_cursor_wait(0);
03548 
03549     BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "%d x %s: %.2f ms,  average: %.4f", iter, infostr, time, time / iter);
03550     
03551     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03552 }
03553 
03554 static void WM_OT_redraw_timer(wmOperatorType *ot)
03555 {
03556     ot->name = "Redraw Timer";
03557     ot->idname = "WM_OT_redraw_timer";
03558     ot->description = "Simple redraw timer to test the speed of updating the interface";
03559 
03560     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
03561     ot->exec = redraw_timer_exec;
03562     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
03563 
03564     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", redraw_timer_type_items, 0, "Type", "");
03565     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "iterations", 10, 1, INT_MAX, "Iterations", "Number of times to redraw", 1, 1000);
03566 
03567 }

03608 /* ******************************************************* */
03609 
03610 static int wm_ndof_sensitivity_exec(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
03611 {
03612     const float min = 0.25f, max = 4.f; // TODO: get these from RNA property
03613     float change;
03614     float sensitivity = U.ndof_sensitivity;
03615 
03616     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "fast"))
03617         change = 0.5f;  // 50% change
03618     else
03619         change = 0.1f;  // 10%
03620 
03621     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "decrease")) {
03622         sensitivity -= sensitivity * change; 
03623         if (sensitivity < min)
03624             sensitivity = min;
03625     }
03626     else {
03627         sensitivity += sensitivity * change; 
03628         if (sensitivity > max)
03629             sensitivity = max;
03630     }
03631 
03632     if (sensitivity != U.ndof_sensitivity) {
03633         U.ndof_sensitivity = sensitivity;
03634     }
03635 
03636     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03637 }
03638 
03639 static void WM_OT_ndof_sensitivity_change(wmOperatorType *ot)
03640 {
03641     ot->name = "Change NDOF sensitivity";
03642     ot->idname = "WM_OT_ndof_sensitivity_change";
03643     ot->description = "Change NDOF sensitivity";
03644     
03645     ot->exec = wm_ndof_sensitivity_exec;
03646 
03647     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "decrease", 1, "Decrease NDOF sensitivity", "If true then action decreases NDOF sensitivity instead of increasing");
03648     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "fast", 0, "Fast NDOF sensitivity change", "If true then sensitivity changes 50%, otherwise 10%");
03649 } 
03650 
03651 
03652 static void operatortype_ghash_free_cb(wmOperatorType *ot)
03653 {
03654     if (ot->last_properties) {
03655         IDP_FreeProperty(ot->last_properties);
03656         MEM_freeN(ot->last_properties);
03657     }
03658 
03659     if (ot->macro.first)
03660         wm_operatortype_free_macro(ot);
03661 
03662     if (ot->ext.srna) /* python operator, allocs own string */
03663         MEM_freeN((void *)ot->idname);
03664 
03665     MEM_freeN(ot);
03666 }
03667 
03668 /* ******************************************************* */
03669 /* called on initialize WM_exit() */
03670 void wm_operatortype_free(void)
03671 {
03672     BLI_ghash_free(global_ops_hash, NULL, (GHashValFreeFP)operatortype_ghash_free_cb);
03673     global_ops_hash = NULL;
03674 }
03675 
03676 /* called on initialize WM_init() */
03677 void wm_operatortype_init(void)
03678 {
03679     global_ops_hash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_strhash, BLI_ghashutil_strcmp, "wm_operatortype_init gh");
03680 
03681     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_window_duplicate);
03682     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_read_homefile);
03683     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_read_factory_settings);
03684     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_save_homefile);
03685     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_window_fullscreen_toggle);
03686     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_quit_blender);
03687     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_open_mainfile);
03688     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_link_append);
03689     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_recover_last_session);
03690     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_recover_auto_save);
03691     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_save_as_mainfile);
03692     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_save_mainfile);
03693     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_redraw_timer);
03694     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_memory_statistics);
03695     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_dependency_relations);
03696     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_debug_menu);
03697     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_splash);
03698     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_search_menu);
03699     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_call_menu);
03700     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_radial_control);
03701     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_ndof_sensitivity_change);
03702 #if defined(WIN32)
03703     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_console_toggle);
03704 #endif
03705 
03706 #ifdef WITH_COLLADA
03707     /* XXX: move these */
03708     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_collada_export);
03709     WM_operatortype_append(WM_OT_collada_import);
03710 #endif
03711 }

03713 /* circleselect-like modal operators */
03714 static void gesture_circle_modal_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
03715 {
03716     static EnumPropertyItem modal_items[] = {
03717         {GESTURE_MODAL_CANCEL,  "CANCEL", 0, "Cancel", ""},
03718         {GESTURE_MODAL_CONFIRM, "CONFIRM", 0, "Confirm", ""},
03719         {GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_ADD, "ADD", 0, "Add", ""},
03720         {GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_SUB, "SUBTRACT", 0, "Subtract", ""},
03721 
03722         {GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT,  "SELECT", 0, "Select", ""},
03723         {GESTURE_MODAL_DESELECT, "DESELECT", 0, "DeSelect", ""},
03724         {GESTURE_MODAL_NOP, "NOP", 0, "No Operation", ""},
03725 
03726         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
03727 
03728     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_modalkeymap_get(keyconf, "View3D Gesture Circle");
03729 
03730     /* this function is called for each spacetype, only needs to add map once */
03731     if (keymap && keymap->modal_items) return;
03732 
03733     keymap = WM_modalkeymap_add(keyconf, "View3D Gesture Circle", modal_items);
03734 
03735     /* items for modal map */
03736     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, ESCKEY,    KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CANCEL);
03737     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, RIGHTMOUSE, KM_ANY, KM_ANY, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CANCEL);
03738 
03739     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, RETKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CONFIRM);
03740     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, PADENTER, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CONFIRM);
03741 
03742     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
03743 
03744 #if 0 // Durien guys like this :S
03745     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_DESELECT);
03746     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, KM_SHIFT, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_NOP);
03747 #else
03748     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_DESELECT); //  default 2.4x
03749     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_NOP); //  default 2.4x
03750 #endif
03751 
03752     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_NOP);
03753 
03754     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, WHEELUPMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_SUB);
03755     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, PADMINUS, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_SUB);
03756     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, WHEELDOWNMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_ADD);
03757     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, PADPLUSKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, GESTURE_MODAL_CIRCLE_ADD);
03758 
03759     /* assign map to operators */
03760     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "VIEW3D_OT_select_circle");
03761     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "UV_OT_circle_select");
03762     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "CLIP_OT_select_circle");
03763 
03764 }

03802         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};

03838     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "PAINT_OT_hide_show");
03839     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_select_border");
03840 //  WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "SCREEN_OT_border_select"); // template
03841     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "SEQUENCER_OT_select_border");
03842     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "SEQUENCER_OT_view_ghost_border");
03843     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "UV_OT_select_border");
03844     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "CLIP_OT_select_border");

03884 
03885 /* default keymap for windows and screens, only call once per WM */
03886 void wm_window_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
03887 {
03888     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Window", 0, 0);
03889     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
03890     
03891     /* note, this doesn't replace existing keymap items */
03892     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "WM_OT_window_duplicate", WKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL | KM_ALT, 0);
03893     #ifdef __APPLE__
03894     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_read_homefile", NKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_OSKEY, 0);
03895     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "INFO_MT_file_open_recent", OKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT | KM_OSKEY, 0);
03896     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_open_mainfile", OKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_OSKEY, 0);
03897     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_save_mainfile", SKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_OSKEY, 0);
03898     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_save_as_mainfile", SKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT | KM_OSKEY, 0);
03899     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_quit_blender", QKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_OSKEY, 0);
03900     #endif
03901     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_read_homefile", NKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
03902     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_save_homefile", UKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0); 
03903     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "INFO_MT_file_open_recent", OKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT | KM_CTRL, 0);

03996 
03997 /* Generic itemf's for operators that take library args */
03998 static EnumPropertyItem *rna_id_itemf(bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), int *do_free, ID *id, int local)
03999 {
04000     EnumPropertyItem item_tmp = {0}, *item = NULL;
04001     int totitem = 0;
04002     int i = 0;
04003 
04004     for (; id; id = id->next) {
04005         if (local == FALSE || id->lib == NULL) {
04006             item_tmp.identifier = item_tmp.name = id->name + 2;
04007             item_tmp.value = i++;
04008             RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &item_tmp);
04009         }
04010     }
04011 
04012     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
04013     *do_free = 1;
04014 
04015     return item;
04016 }
04017 
04018 /* can add more as needed */
04019 EnumPropertyItem *RNA_action_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *do_free)
04020 {
04021     return rna_id_itemf(C, ptr, do_free, C ? (ID *)CTX_data_main(C)->action.first : NULL, FALSE);
04022 }
04023 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
04024 EnumPropertyItem *RNA_action_local_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *do_free)
04025 {
04026     return rna_id_itemf(C, ptr, do_free, C ? (ID *)CTX_data_main(C)->action.first : NULL, TRUE);
04027 }
04028 #endif
